name: DOWNTOWN/GLEBE HOUSE WITH BACKYARD
description:
Big 3 bedroom house with backyard in desirable neighbourhood within walking distance to TD Place, the Rideau canal, Dows lake. Bus stop accross the street that will take you to parliament buillding, Byward Market and Rideau Centre in 10 minutes.

The space
Big 3 bedroom house located in the trendy Glebe area, parking for 3 cars, huge backyard with Webber bbq, internet, satelite tv and laundry. Located in family friendly area with lots of parks, shops and restaurants. No parties responsible adults only. 10 minutes walk to the Rideau Canal . 10 minute bus ride to the Parliament or Rideau Centre/Byward Market.

Guest access
Guest have access to the entire home and private backgard a great place to unwinde and escape the city centre while still being within a 20 minute walk to the dowtown core

name: Westboro Village Executive Suite
description:
A tastefully decorated and well equipped upper level apartment with a private walk-up entrance and free parking. In the heart of Westboro Village, one of Ottawa's most desirable neighbourhoods—Enjoy a central location without the hassles of downtown.

The space
This ideal executive suite boasts a cozy bedroom and a separate office space, perfect for anyone who needs plenty of space to relax and work. A large open-concept kitchen and dining area connect to a beautiful living room with a gas fireplace and a large sun-drenched deck overlooking a backyard garden.

You'll be lulled by the restful ambiance in this home on a calm cul-de-sac, but you'll also be tempted to put on your walking shoes and explore the area. Westboro's trendy village main street, with its coffee shops and specialty boutiques, is just beyond the doorstep! Within a ten minute walk along Richmond Road, there is something for your every mood: find ingredients for a great home-cooked meal

name: Quiet Room with a view in the Ottawa Downtown
description:
Renting only to females. Modern condo with panoramic river view is 5 min walk to the Parliament. Comfortable room has full size bed, desk and closet. Living room, well equipped kitchen and bathroom are shared. Plenty of walks and bike paths around. My place is close to music festivals, NAC, museums, Little Italy, Byward Market, and Chinatown. I share knowledge about museums, concerts, parks and cultural events in our cosy capital. The room can be also rented monthly. Nespresso morning coffee.

The space
Enjoy all the events of the downtown life: concerts, festivals, historical places, canal, biking, Chinatown, Little Italy, yoga and much more of our unique and exciting Ottawa!

One bedroom available in this two bedroom condo on the 15th floor of a modern building. The apartment is very clean and well maintained and has a large balcony with a beautiful view of the river and downtown.

Located just a 5 min walk from Parliament Hill, the famous

name: Loft-style 2 BR in ByWard Market
description:
Welcome to your home away from home, 2 bedrooms on a quiet tree-lined street just steps to all the action of the ByWard Market, National Gallery, and easy access to embassies, shopping, Parliament, Rideau Centre, and Rideau Station on the O-Train LRT. Excellent coffee, local brunch place and fiery Caribbean chicken all at the end of the block!

The space
The open main living/dining/kitchen area makes it easy to have friends over for dinner or drinks, and 2 private bedrooms with a luxe bathroom make it easy to get the relaxation and restoration you need.

Guest access
You'll have the whole loft-style flat to yourself, easy access from the main floor porch.

Other things to note
This is a unique, century old home - with all the quirks that come with it - this isn't a new build, and I really live here most of the time, so please note you'll be in a home, not an exclusively guest space.

name: Half-basement apt. guest private entrance, 3-bdrm
description:
GREAT for a family or a group.

Return single traveller can ask for better price.

Half-basement apartment with guest private entrance, kitchen, bathroom, eating & living areas, 3 bedrooms, 3 queen beds, plus 1 single bed & 1 futon of double size.

Safe & quiet neighborhood; Buses nearby, driveway parking for 2 cars, and street parking. Internet included.

No party, no smoke in the Apt. No breakfast provided.

You are more than welcome to introduce yourself.

The space
Located in a very safe neighborhood circled by friendly neighbors. Enclosed by bus service of the city of Ottawa, conveniently within walking distance, bus (#277) is less than 5 min walking, #80, #99 less than 10 min, #94 is about 13 min walking. All buses go to downtown, Algonquin College. Easy highway access, especially when you use the highway 416 (about 10 min driving). Free driveway parking.
Newly designed, modern house, clean and beautif

description:

The rooms are beautifully furnished and tastefully designed for your comfort. name: Family Home in Ottawa's Hintonburg
description:
Our classic renovated home is one half of a duplex, on a quiet street, close to downtown and Parliament Hill. Enjoy our peaceful shared outdoor garden and patio.

Walking distance to the Rosemount library, the Marche grocery store, Parkdale Farmer's Market, many parks and splashpads, restaurants, shopping, festivals, river walking/biking path, Rideau canal, Little Italy, Chinatown.

Biking distance to downtown and Parliament Hill, which is a 10-15 minute direct bus ride.

The space
This is our family home, and we're out of town! We hope you enjoy your stay.

Recently-renovated bright kitchen. Large open-concept dining/living room with minimal furniture where you can breathe and relax.

It's one half of a duplex, and our next door neighbours are amazing and considerate.

Wifi available on site, and a PS3 with Netflix and DVD/BluRay player on the main floor.

1 master bedroom w/King size bed, 1 kids' bed

description:
Charming three story home in the Byward Market in downtown Ottawa. 7 block walk (5 minutes) to Byward Market Building. Three bedrooms. All linens and towels. Full Bathroom with beautiful slate tiles. Bright living room with gleaming hardwood floors. Separate dining room with hardwood floors. Private deck for BBQ and quiet time.

The space
*Due to COVID19 we are allowing 4 days in between each rental for our cleaners and your protection. Through Airbnb's system we have blocked 2 days before and after each reservarion. Stay safe!

LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!

Please ask if you want to arrive the same day as another guests is departing. We will try to accommodate with a late check in of 4pm.

Charming three story home. 7 block walk (5 minutes) to Byward Market Building. 2 separate bedrooms, 1 loft bedroom. Bathroom with beautiful slate tiles. Bright living room with gleaming hardwood floors. Separate dining room with hardwood floors

name: Progressive, Eco-friendly, Central
description:
Angela's B&B is a large old rambling family house located in central Ottawa on unceded Algonquin territory.
The room is a traditional room with a double bed and is located on the third floor. It has a private deck. Also open for guest use, there is a library-den and home office desk space on the third floor. All bathrooms are shared.
Accommodation includes unlimited organic fair-trade coffee and tea. If desired a full, mostly organic breakfast is available for $15.00.

The space
The Glebe House is a lively open-minded family household located in the centre of Ottawa on unceded Algonquin territory. We love to welcome guests who have interesting tales to tell and hold politically progressive and eco-friendly values. We have a large rambling old house with all amenities and a large backyard where we try to grow organic vegetables, BBQ and hold music, poetry and fund-raising shows.

This room is on the third floor (quiet) and has a double size bed.

Main bath with towel warmer to both keep towels dry but also warm when you come out of the shower/tub.

description:
The space
Large, sunny furnished room with queen bed on the top floor of our semi-detached home. Includes large private bathroom with full tub/shower. Free parking is available.

There is a second bedroom on same floor, also with a queen bed (see photos) available on request (ideal for groups of 3-4). If you don't wish to use the extra bedroom, it will be left vacant. Either way the 3rd floor is all yours!

We are in the heart of Centretown on a quiet treed street between two bike lanes. Bus stops are close by and we are walking distance to most of Ottawa's best spots - Chinatown, downtown, the Glebe, Parliament Hill, the Byward Market and the Rideau Canal.

Our place is a 3-story semi built in 1907. The bedrooms are on the third floor, along with a large, bright private bathroom with tub and shower.

We have laundry in the basement and a nice back patio. The entrance, kitchen and living room are on the first floor. We occupy the sec

name: Home in Ottawa's BEST neighbourhood
description:
The space
A recently renovated 3 bedroom (+ basement suite) character home in Ottawa's hippest neighbourhood, Hintonburg.

A 5 minute drive (or 10 minute bike ride along the beautiful river pathway) to downtown and just steps away from all the fantastic shops and restaurants of Wellington Ave. We love our home, but travel a lot (especially in the summer) and we love to share our home with other families who are visiting Ottawa.

Our home offers 3 bedrooms upstairs - a master bedroom with ensuite and a great sunroom/office and two kids rooms - one with a loft bed and one with two twin/king beds (depending on your needs).

The main floor is open concept with huge windows facing out onto the backyard. Perfect for relaxing at the end of a busy day of exploring!

Big backyard and sunny front porch are great for sunny days. Home has AC too for Ottawa's hot summer days.

The neighbourhood is AWESOME - tons of parks,

description:

name: Summertime in Ottawa
description:
Fabulous house in Ottawa's hippest neighbourhood! Only 3 km to Parliament hill - half an hour walk or 10 minute convenient transit ride. Home is entirely renovated. Bright kitchen. Cozy living spaces. Ensuite master bath. Huge backyard with gorgeous screened in porch. Two parking spots. Walk to the restaurants and shops of Wellington and Preston Streets. Lots of nearby parks and splash pads.

The space
Our home is entirely renovated, warm, welcoming and full of charm. It's located in Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhood, but is a quiet and peaceful oasis.

Guest access

The unit has been recently renovated. It is a semi-basement level with five windows, kitchenette, full bathroom, and large walking-in closet. Access to shared laundry facilities.

The stop of bus No. 6 is around the corner.

Non-smoker. Single occupancy.

If you're driving; close to Hunt Club highway entrance and Airport Parkway. If you need tips and ideas of what to do just ask. Near parks and long walks through the pathways are nice. Forest and golf courses and soon to be Hard Rock Café Casino nearby while still being in the city. Close to Calypso water park.

The space
Very large room, spans the entire 3rd floor (380 sq. ft). Three windows, a microwave, gas fireplace, desk, queen size bed, futon, couch, large screen TV, self controlled electric heating for winter time. Two desks if you need to get some work done.

Kitchen, Family Room/Living Room, Upstairs Bathroom, Downstairs Powder Room, Laundry, Backyard with BBQ (summer).

Netflix & Prime Video available. Fun, trendy neighbourhood that has everything you need right at your front door, from pool to beach to farmers market to outdoor festivals to (paid) gym close by. Easy access public transit and ground floor access with small outdoor space & parking! Little black cat also lives here!

The space
The apartment has a front porch for lounging and people watching, is close to downtown Ottawa and all public transit, parking available and TONS of great places to eat and drink minutes from the front door! The air mattress sleeps 2 people and the super comfy bed sleeps 2. There is a/c in the bedroom and front room, and you are welcome to use the washer/dryer as well. You will have access to Netflix and Prime Video. The couch in the picture is gone - it is now a

Walk to everything, steps to canal, LCBO, Grocery Store and shops and bars of Elgin. Unfortunately, due to new Ottawa regulations, this unit is only available for 30 days or more.

The space
Latest addition to my 3 other AirbnB rentals. More recent pics to follow.
Large Main Floor 2 Bedroom apt, Huge Living room with Huge South facing Bay Windows, very bright and sunny, High ceilings, Deep cove moldings, original fireplace in living room, Hardwood throughout, Slate Kitchen, French Door fridge, Gas Fireplace in Kitchen. Bathroom has just undergone a complete makeover.

Clean and quiet house. Hardwood floors. 50 yr old home was totally renovated 10 yrs ago. In a quiet location backing onto Parkwa

It's a few minutes walk from parks, great museums, arts and culture, Parliament Hill, the Byward Market,  restaurants and dining... My place is comfortable, cozy and chic and located in an upscale neighbourhood. It's good for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers that appreciate a unique space.​

There is a door leading to the guest suite from the living room but no separate entrance. The suite has its own living room and a private bathroom. We only rent out to one guest at a time so yourself will live in the entire unit, there won't be any other guests besides you. This country house is located in forest with birds, deer and other wild animals in backyard! Enjoy your stay!

The space
The guest unit is not the entire house; attached to the house but secluded. There is no separate entrance for the unit, entrance is shared with the house.
There is a microwave a toast ovens and a coffee machine in the unit. Coffee pods, cream are provided.
No pet and no perfume policy makes it safe for guests with allergies.
Two bedrooms: two queen-sized beds with high quality pillows and linens.
Living-room is open and bright, it contains a so

Other things to note
Street parking only. (overn

A perfectly central landing spot for your visit to the Nation's Capital. From our doorstep, you have easy access to Parliament and the vibrant ByWard Market either by bus or on foot. Explore Ottawa's stunning green space with a short stroll to Dow's Lake and the Rideau Canal.

Perched at the junction of some of Ottawa's trendiest neighbourhoods and restaurants, you are surrounded by all the city has to offer in this renovated century home.

The listing is for one bedroom.

Other things to note

The front stoop allows for open alcohol, allowing for a refreshing social moment after a day's effort.

A beach style chalet, I Love Your House is an open concept single family home, very bright, with a big backyard, located in the heart of Center town Ottawa. Built in the 1800s, it's been totally renovated, yet maintains the charm of an old log home.

The space

'I Love Your House' features an open concept design, with a split-level living and kitchen area, plus 1/2 bath, on the ground floor, and two bedrooms plus a main bathroom on the split-level second floor. The large master bedroom has a queen-size bed, Smart TV, plenty of closet space, and backyard-facing balcony. The second bedroom has a double bed, a beautiful armoire, and a balcony that faces the street. There is a huge, new deck, with a covered porch and bbq in the back yard, plus room to park two cars. Lots of windows throughout and very bright. It's a very clean, happy and warm environment,

You get the top two floors for your exclusive use. The front door is Bluetooth keyless entry or keyed entry, at your option. There is a

This 3-bedroom, 1960's bungalow has nostalgic charm with a modern finish. Located in a quiet neighbourhood close to all the amenities, our home is a lovely spot to stay if you're in town to see the sights or catch some R&R.

The rear of the house has a 4-piece bath and three bedrooms: the master bedroom with a king bed, corner room with a queen, and hall room with two singles. For more sleep space the sofa in the living room pulls-out to a double bed.

Our bright, cozy home is ideally located for those working at the hospital and is perfectly spacious for families or small groups just visiting town.

Guest access
Dur

NON SMOKING

Other things to note
In humid weather, there could be moisture on the floor due to the air conditioning. Please let us know immediately if there is any issue. This happens during the months of July and August and only for a few days. It is impossible to predict and is a natural occurrence in a older home with a freshly poured concrete basement. We have consulted professionals and there is no danger.

Second bedroo

My house is conveniently close to the highway in west Ottawa. Driving to Downtown Ottawa takes 10 minutes

The room is on the Second floor facing East. Access to living space, backyard, and a shared Powder Room on the first floor.

Lovely walk using 2 bike trails: in Ottawa Central Park and bike trail. Close by shopping on Merivale Avenue, drink at Second Cup, Starbucks, St-Louis, Dairy Queen or many more. Several restaurants available in the area.

The space
This house is nicely situated in a quiet area, but yet conveniently close to shopping area. The room is on the second floor with sunny mornings, with shades if desired. We offer continental breakfast to our guests. Access to shared living space, backyard, shared Powder Room on first floor, and full guest bathroom on the second floor.

Guest access

name: Ottawa Solo Traveller
description:
Downtown location walking distance to important Touristic sites from 5 minutes to 40 minutes, but also plenty transportation. Free WIFI . Cook at home or enjoy Lots of restaurants, coffee shops around with live music, art, recitals and shows steps from the house. So stay with us and relax in a clean, safe , comfortable bedroom just perfect for budget travellers. Simple and affordable!

The space
This is small bedroom nicely furnished, it has a single bed, closet, desk and window. Cozy and comfortable. Most guests are from all over the world.

Feel free to use the kitchen, living room and refrigerator.

Other things to note
No cooking, No alcohol or Noise at the property late at night after 9pm.

Well located and only 15 mins away from the downtown, you will find yourself only few steps away from many convenience stores, drugstores, restaurants, bus stops, hospitals and many more.We would love to welcome you in our humble home while you explore our amazing Nation's Capital!Our home is perfect for receiving couples, individual travelers, group of 2 people and for business travelers as well.

Guests have access to all the shared common areas such as the kitchen, laundry room, living room spaces, free parking spaces on the premise, dining room and the backyard patio.

Guests have access to all common areas such as the kitchen, living room spaces, laundry room, free parking spaces and backyard patio.

Other things to note

You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood and the comfy bed.

Parking available at a nominal fee - please ask if you require this.

Parking upon availability with extra fee $ / Pets are welcome with a fee $.

The space
This apartment is the perfect blend of neutral tones, easy on the eyes and ideal for relaxation or work. The splendid king sized bed, the perfect indoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and steam room in the building are perfect for keeping fit or unwinding after your day.

Due to Covid19 some amenities might be closed until further notice.

Part of original Billings estate,our heritage home is centrally located across the street from the scenic Rideau River and bike path,cycle to the Byward Market,Parliament or any of the 3 universities near by.Just 2 blocks to major transit and walking distance to restaurants, coffee shops, Landsdowne park and other amenities.Our sprawling landscaped property is a rare city find with salt water pool and hot-tub.The house has fully renovated kitchen and several shared living spaces. Coffee/Tea incl

The space
Our home is one of oldest, residential homes in the city. The original log structure was built in 1828 and has been designated a Heritage Property. The house has been meticulously maintained, expanded and updated with all the modern conveniences while respecting the original character. The bedroom we offer is very large with a mini fridge, desk, closet and sitting area.

Guest access
We really want our guests to feel at home. The only ar

name: Exec house:3BR/6ppl with hot tub & salt water pool
description:
Situated in a family friendly neighbourhood in Ottawa, our home is best suited for families mature adults, and business travellers.

Note:
The pool is open from July 1 - September 30 and heated using solar power.

The hot tub is open year round.

Allergy alert: We have a family cat that isn't on the property when the house is rented.

Our home is a comfortable setting, in a residential neighbourhood, close to TD Place for major sporting events such as CFL, concerts, OHL, professional soccer. Our home is NOT baby/toddler/child proof, so please bring everything you need if you're a young family with those needs.

Other things to note
The fridge is 95% empty, but we do leave essentials like condiments for our guests to use. I also provide the top drawer of the freezer should guests need/want to freeze anything during your stay. Our fridge has an ice maker so ice is readily available. The cupb

description:
Large, bright and spacious bedroom with private ensuite bathroom, and two beds Located in Ottawa's west end in Kanata.

Free driveway parking for one vehicle, full use of shared kitchen, and free unlimited WiFi.

Guest access
Kitchen, private bathroom, BBQ, WiFi,

name: Located in Trendy Westboro Area (King size bed)
description:
Hello!

We have a private room available with a king size bed located on the second floor of our home. Guests have access to our kitchen, laundry, WiFi/internet, TV in the leaving room and back yard with hot tub.

We are a same-sex couple with a teenager who might be with us during your stay. We also have a very small affectionate dog. Our home is very quiet, calming and respectful. Reiki is also available.

Public transit is located in front of the house and street parking is available nearby.

You can walk to the Glebe and shop the small boutiques. The available apartment is a recently remodeled private, large basement of this house, with windows and natural light; perfectly clean and tidy, designed as an in- law suite and completely private. Good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The space
Built in the 60's my large bungalow home has gone through many modern changes and updates. However, inside I have kept with the original floor plan and character, making it a pretty unique house. It is quite big for a bungalow but once you step inside it has a very cozy and homey feel. Outdoor space and gardens are available in good weather.

The apartment for rent is in the basement of the house. It includes a kitchen, 3-piece bathroom, plenty of in-room st

name: Great Location in Modern Townhouse
description:
Great location in modern 2 floor townhouse/terrace house near all amenities and a park.

Close to St. Laurent Center (2 exits on 417 from downtown or short bus ride).

You’ll love the location, price, free parking,layout, bbq, 2 very comfortable beds, unlimited internet and Netflix.

For longer term stays please email.

The space

Guest access
This is a basement apartment that was custom built for the purpose. You'll have a modern kitchen and bathroom and sleep on a Murphy bed with a custom made mattress.

name: Double cast iron bed large room in basement.
description:

Close to bus routes going to directly to OttawaU and to the Byward Market. Arts and cultural tourist locations are no more than 10 minutes drive to Parliament, Museums, government offices.

Great for solo adventurers, interns, and business travellers.

The space
It is a large private room with a Double cast iron bed, antique dresser with large mirror, armoire and love seat. 2 washrooms available the guest- powder room on the main floor, and a full bathroom on the second floor which as been newly renovated. Modern kitchen, cupboard and fridge space. Laundry room. Enjoy the hammock in the backyard.

Guest access
You are welcome to use the kitchen, backyard, laundry, bbq, wifi, iron, hair dryer, towels, linens.

name: Spacious 2 BR - Perfect for Couples & Families!

Short drive to: Ottawa Canal, Landsdown Live, TD Place, Little Italy, Carleton University, Parliament Hill, Byward Market, Museums, Rideau Centre. Drive to Quebec for hiking or Le Nordic spa.

Perfect for: Couples, small groups, business travellers and families.

+ Bathroom & Laundry: Shower, vanity, washer and dryer, towels, blow dryer, shampoo, conditioner, and soap.

+ Kitchen: Dining table and chairs. Fridge, countertop oven, two-burner stove top, dishes, cutlery, pots and pans, rice cooker, coffee maker, blender, toaster and utensils. N

Every comfort you can possibly need.

You’ll love our property because of the cosiness, the views of the gardens and pool and it's excellent access to anywhere in the City.

It is a great spot for business, solo travellers, couples & small families.

The space
This property was designed by a architect who favoured the Frank Lloyd Wright design and architecture so is somewhat unique in the City of Ottawa.

The property was built and lived in by a former Speaker of the House under Prime Minister Pierre Elliott Trudeau; who was also a land developer around Ottawa. We are only the second owners of the house.

This property is designed for comfort, entertaining and to be enjoyed! I

Our place is good for a single female, or male tourists, students business and traveler as well as family up to 2 adults

Apartment owners are conveniently also local restaurant people. Able and willing to help you make

The U of O is also a 15 min., walk. Easy access to highways & buses.
Home away from home. Warm, cosy ground floor apt., private entrance. Quite neighbors & neighbourhood. . Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, & families.

If your looking for a longer stay the larger room on my listing is better - this room is great on shorter stays. Not working space style.

This room has closet space with hangers and and empty dresser with large mirror for your use. In summer I have AC and also a small fan in the room for guest's use. The memory foam mattress is very comfortable.

Other things to note

Hairdryer in the bathroom,
Iron and ironing board available in the corr

All of these neighbourhoods include Ottawa's best restaurants and bars, parks, museums, and all the major attractions.

The space

- No elevators, just a few outdoor steps to the apartment.
- Bedroom: Queen-size bed. Pillows and bedding provided.
- Living room: Open concept living space. Large comfortable couch with SMART TV, Apple TV, and complimentary Netflix.
- Bathroom: Large shower. Towels, shampoo,

Our home is the perfect quiet lodging for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers - but not children and no more than 2 people.

The space
The unit has lots of room to breath - a large TV/sitting area with gas fireplace. There is a small fridge to keep your food and drinks cold as well as a coffeemaker, kettle, toaster oven, glasses, cups, plates and cutlery. There is a hair dryer in the bathroom and an iron and ironing board in the bedroom. It is a basement unit, but well lit, with a large window facing the pool. There is also a ping pong table for a game - or to spread out your travel gear. We also have central A/C.

Guest access
The basement suite with separate entrance, bedroom and den area is all yours. The pool is open for your us

name: Chic Unit in Sandy Hill / Spacious Private Backyard Access
description:
Relax with friends in the private backyard outside this charming apartment close to downtown and the Rideau Canal. The space is new—built in 2014—and features high ceilings and plenty of natural light despite being located on the lower level.

The bathroom shower has just been update in Jan 2020 to a full size 5 ft base with 2 glass sliding doors.

description:
This house is located is a safe and quiet neighborhood, with a short walk to grocery stores, parks, library, recreational center, restaurants and bike paths. It is a 20-minute drive to downtown and 7-minute drive to the mall. There is a 2-minute walk bus stop. The house is cozy, quiet and fully furnished. It’s ideal for families, students, and travelers.

The space
Large room with queen size bed. The bed can easily fit 2 people. An additional room can be booked upon request for a $50 charge.

There are 2 of us living in the house; my wife and myself. We are laid-back people who like to spend their time at the gym, swimming, reading and walking.

Guest access
Guest will have access to everything in the house, including: 
Fridge, microwave, oven, kettle and coffee machine.
Fully furnished kitchen - utensils, plates, cups, cooking pans, cooking gear, etc. 
Free parking.  High speed internet.
Washing & drying mach

description:
**Please note, this is only suitable for 2 adults/2 children, 3 adults/1 child, it is NOT suitable for 4 adults, bookings of 4 adults will not be accepted**

Newly renovated and finished to a high standard. Queen size bed, comfy sofa, tea & coffee making facilities, dressing table with hair drier, wifi, towels & bedding. Room for roll out bed and travel cot if needed. Off road parking available. Children welcome.

The space
Newly renovated to a high standard with comfy furnishings. There is a small sofa and tea and coffee making facilities within the room. The bathroom is shared with others in the house. There is a small living room on the same floor that you are welcome to use, but may be shared if there are other guests staying in our other room. You are welcome to use our kitchen and dining room upon request, but please leave it as you find it.
We kindly request that no food be consumed in the bedroom or living room.

Guest access

description:
A large one bedroom apartment on the second floor of a heritage home on a quiet residential street beside the Byward Market. All the character of a heritage home - hardwood floors, high ceilings, claw foot bathtub, large windows, and two balconies.
The location is perfect. Right beside the Byward Market, Parliament, the National Art Gallery, the Ottawa River and bike paths. It is so central but the street itself is a calm residential street with little street noise.

The space
There is a balcony at the back of the apartment shared with the neighbours but they are lovely people and won’t mind sharing and meeting travellers!

I live in the unit below so I'm always around if you have any questions. The home and kitchen is fully stocked just like when I lived there so no need to bring your own salt and pepper.

Guest access
The home is entirely yours while you stay here, and you will be able to come and go as you please.

There is a fridge, stove, dishwasher, lots of cooking utens

Caffeine junkies take note! We have a Breville espresso maker that pours the most deli

This is everything you love in a village but in the City!

The kitchen is equipped with all typical appliances and tools, a natural gas commercial style 36" gas range with large oven and griddle plate, keurig coffee machine and other.

The kitchen, office , dining, and living space is open co

This spacious unit with 1600 sqft features two large bedrooms, an open concept main floor with large eat-in kitchen, balcony and parking onsite. The space

The space
This post and beam home is open concept with the living dining and kitchen areas open to each other. There are main floor, upper and lower level bedrooms. The house is heated by geothermal heating and a woodstove.
It is equipped with 5 appliances and a washer /dryer which guests can use.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the house and the acres of bush and places to walk surrounding the home.

Other things to note
In the summer you can relax on the sun drenched deck and in both Winter and Summer you can build a fire in the outdoor fire pit on the patio.There are lots of all season activities nearby - In summer, swimming, canoe

You’ll love my place because of the open concept layout (lots of light), the swimming pool (salt system), the hot tub, the comfy beds, the European flair... and Spencer the Cat! Great for families, friends, or groups of business travellers.

The other bedrooms have a double bed and are adjacent to a full bathroom . The kitchen is fully equipped (including a Nestle Dolce Gusto espresso machine). The pool and the landscaped backyard may be a seasonal treat, but the hot tub is functional year-round, and conveniently located just off the kitchen patio door. There is a lovely gas fireplace in the living

...likely because the warm colours are relaxing and inviting I was once told by a relative stranger "I could write poetry in your place" no pressure...maybe you could just relax and read some poetry.

name: Modern Kanata Executive Townhome w/ Parking
description:
Enjoy a stress-free self check-in, no need to meet up or keep a strict schedule! This beautifully appointed, modern executive townhouse in Kanata South (Monahan Landing) is sure to please. 20 minutes from downtown Ottawa, 10 minutes from Canadian Tire Centre, this bright home full of natural light backs on to the forest and is in quiet suburbia close to grocery stores, shopping centres and the Greenbelt with hiking trails and cross country skiing.

This ultra modern, 2 year old executive townhouse has hardwood floors and plush carpets throughout. Start off your morning with a mug of complimentary coffee or tea and enjoy the view of the forest out the backyard.
Enjoy Netflix and cable with Sportsnet package on the living room's 55" plasma TV, or fall asleep watching the 42" plasma in the master bedroom.

The master bedroom has a queen bed with ensuite his and hers bathroom, guest bedroom has a double bed with cheater door access to the main bath. Plenty of room

name: Private, quiet, clean apartment
description:
My place is 3 km from downtown - an average of 10 minutes away by car, and 15 minutes by bus. It is conveniently located for central destinations such as the Byward Market, national museums, National Gallery, National Arts Centre, Parliament Hill, and Rideau Canal, and many amenities such as recreational pathways, main streets, supermarkets, etc., and to venues for many of Ottawa's 33 festivals, including Winterlude, Tulip Festival, and the Blues Fest.

The space
The apartment has been recently renovated and it is very clean and cheerful. It is two-storey with a bedroom and bathroom upstairs, and a combined living room and kitchen on the ground floor. The front door is on the east side of the house, and the back door opens onto a nice private deck surrounded by greenery, which is for guests only.

My street is a quiet one with a cul-de-sac to the east and a one-way street for west-bound traffic ending at a small residential junction at its western end.

name: 2 Bedroom apt., stones throw from Civic Hospital
description:
This main floor apartment is very close to Civic Hospital (3 blocks-6 min walk) and is a dedicated rental so all areas of the unit are accessible. You’ll love the cosiness, high ceilings, and the comfy beds. It is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids).
Great for anyone that needs to be close to the Civic hospital/Heart Institute/Royal Ottawa. You’re also close to the experimental farm and the shops/restaurants of Westboro.

The space
This two bedroom apartment is very charming with hardwood floors throughout.

Guest access
Guests have full access to the apartment

Other things to note
Located North or Carling in civic hospital area, not South in Carlington.

Also note that as mentioned in some reviews, we live above the unit with 3 young kids and you will hear their footsteps.

name: Private apartment in the heart of Chinatown
description:
This apartment is ideal for travelling couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
Great location to experience so much of what Ottawa has to offer. Located directly in vibrant Centretown West, just steps away from the heart of Chinatown with a wide array of restaurants (including famous Vietnamese Pho, Thai, Chinese, Japanese and Korean) and walking distance from some trendy new cafés with live music.
Take in Parliament Hill,Little Italy and Dow’s Lake (all walking distance).

Guest access
You will have full access to the entire apartment.

name: Unique Sanitized Studio - Long & Short Term Stays
description:
Guests have commented that this space is as quiet as a cottage. It is private, comfortable, super clean and central (Westboro-an area full of shops and restaurants and 10 min. from downtown). We offer a place to retreat or work with great coffee, teas, homemade granola, and an outdoor space. Ask us about our two-week quarantine packages! Our sunny studio is located in its own separate building. Note that the bathroom, reserved for guests, is located a few steps away in the main house.

The space
Super clean! There is space to make a meal, work or just relax. There is fast wifi, internet TV, dishes, microwave, fridge, coffee maker, new stove, and a comfortable memory foam futon purchased in 2017. There is cold running water but please note that the bathroom is not in the unit but located a few steps away in the main house. This four-piece bathroom (equipped with linens, shampoo, hair dryer etc.) is reserved for studio guests. There is parking on site for one vehicl

name: Westboro BeachHouse
description:
Welcome!!! Unique & charming, this sun-drenched home is exactly where you want to be. Steps from the beach and right in the heart of trendy Westboro. A quick walk to restaurants and shops. It features a unique zen water garden, cozy gas fireplace, marble and hardwood floors, sun room. On the beautiful Ottawa river in winter you will find groomed ski trails and a perfect toboggan hill for kids, and in summer a sandy beach with a cute little outdoor restaurant with live music some evenings.

The space
Our beach cottage is a well loved family home. We make it available when we go away. It's fully-equipped and welcoming. You will see some personal effects and we hope they make you feel comfortable. Three bedrooms and full bath are located on the main level. Cozy gas fireplace, flat screen TV, welcoming lounge area and brand new full bathroom are on the lower level. Towels and toiletries are provided, all you need is your toothbrush. There are also toys

name: Quiet Downtown, 2 level, Family-friendly Apartment
description:
Sunny two bedroom apartment with queen size bed in master bedroom, queen size bed, single bed and travel crib in enclosed attic and queen sofa bed in living room. Centrally located, the apartment is walking distance to Parliament Hill, the Rideau Canal, Chinatown, the Glebe, Lansdowne Park, restaurants, cafes, boutiques on Bank St and Elgin St., and the Nature Museum.

The space
Renovated, modern and well insulated apartment is the upper unit of an owner occupied duplex. The two level apartment has everything you need; a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, toaster oven, complimentary coffee and tea, wi-fi, and Netflix. There is a four season sun room and a spacious and bright living room. The enclosed attic on the 3rd level provides a separate space for sleeping children away from the kitchen, bathroom, living room and master bedroom. The attic has a washer and dryer, queen bed, single bed and can easily accommodate a travel crib. Please note that t

name: Large Private Room In Spacious Downtown Condo
description:
My condo is very spacious and located centrally downtown. It is steps away from Winterlude and close to Parliament, uOttawa, The Byward Market & Elgin St. You’ll have access to free wi-fi and are free to watch anything you’d like on my 65 inch tv including Netflix. There’s also free street parking in the neighbourhood on weekends. If you have any questions during your stay, I’m always happy to answer them and offer advice on things to do in the city. Thanks & enjoy your stay!

The space
It is self check in as I will leave the keys for you out front of the condo in a lockbox. You will have access to everything in my condo including the washer/dryer if you need it. I have a comfortable queen sized bed in the master bedroom with a private en suite bathroom. The living room is very spacious and you will be able to enjoy my 65 inch smart tv along with all the entertainment systems that I own.

Other things to note
Please treat my home as you would

name: Our Lovely Guest Room (Elcho's ExplOre Ottawa)
description:
Well appointed main floor guest bedroom in our pet & smoke free home. Cleaned & antivirus sanitized. Own bathroom & bedroom. Table top fridge with healthy continental breakfast options in your room.
Wifi.
Walk to downtown, shopping, Byward Market, Rideau & Shaw Centres, Sparks & Elgin Sts, Parliament Hill, Canal, Canada Day, Tulip, Blues, Jazz & Poutine Fests, Pride Week, Ottawa Race and Ottawa U, Museums, walking & biking trails. Almost all embassies, OAG, downtown Ottawa. Ideal location!

The space
Well appointed guest room with overhead fan. Situated on the main floor overlooking a private, beautiful, backyard and garden.
In-room table top fridge, Bodem French Press, kettle, Continental breakfast options including fruits, tea and coffee. Freedom to eat in your own time, space and pace.
This is a summertime guest- room only so you are encouraged to please use the backyard tables, table cloth and chairs for quiet morning breakfast, lazy

I see clients in my home some afternoons during the week.

name: 2 Bedroom Overlooking the Rideau Canal w Parking
description:

The space
The space is a 2 bedroom upper unit with its own entrance. With the Rideau Canal at the doorstep many year round activities can be done including; skating and biking. The Rideau Canal is Ottawas most defining feature aside from Parliament Hill. Within walking distance there is a Loblaws and LCBO. Many restaurants are in walking or short driving area including the By-Ward market, Elgin street and Lansdowne Live. Parliament Hill, Museums, National Arts Centre, Carleton U, UOttawa and the National Gallery of Canada are all close by. The unit includes a full kitchen with a stove, fridge, dishwasher, microwave and Keurig. There are windows are serve as excellent views to see th

description:
My partner and I work full-time but are happy to rent our cozy guest bedroom. We're centrally located in Centretown, approx 25 min walk to Parliament. Door keys are in a lock box as we're not always home when guests arrive.

Guests are welcome to drop bags off between 9am-4pm in the living room.

The room has a queen bed with towels. Common areas are welcome for guests.

Our place is good for solo, couple, and business travelers.

The space
We're in a house just outside of the immediate busy downtown area and two blocks from 2 major bus routes. We're a 5 minute walk from the Greyhound station and approximately 10-15 minute Uber ride from Via Rail.

The room is located on the second floor. It's furnished with a queen bed, luggage rack, and nightstand. We provide towels and extra toiletries if needed. We also have a dining room, living room, and kitchen on the first floor that you are are welcome to use. We do live in th

description:

My lovely, modern home is located close (5 minutes) to the airport, public transportation, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, the gourmet kitchen, the comfy queensize bed and the high ceilings. My home is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

Wonderful location close to South Key Shopping Mall ( Marshalls/Home Sense, Michael's, Walmart, Loblaws, Banks, Roots, Gap, Bowring, Chapter's Staples, etc.), EY Centre, 6+ nice restaurants, golf courses, parks, river, beaches and community centre with indoor swimming pool, cross country trails. description:
Our home is located just 10 minutes from the airport and about 25 minutes from Parliament Hill. Everything you need is 5 minutes away or less, and you'll enjoy most local attractions within 10-20 minutes.

Enjoy spacious living with in 4,500 square foot home, with plenty of room to play, eat, sleep, and have fun (inside and out).

Perfect for families and medium to large groups, with 5 private rooms and sleeping accommodations for up to 14 people (including 1 sofa bed).

The space
Our house is located in a beautiful, quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood south of Ottawa city (though still within city limits). When we moved here we chose it because it was the perfect balance of what we wanted - a large home with a big yard in the country, yet with easy access to the all the city has to off in 20-30 minutes. The home is custom-built and beautifully decorated. It's our family's actual home, so it truly has everything you might want or need, but

name: Cozy room in central Ottawa
description:
Located in the quiet, historic neighbourhood of LeBreton Flats, at the intersection of Little Italy, Chinatown and the trendy Hintonburg village, my home is ideal for business, pleasure or short term accommodation. Easy commute by bus or OTrain to both universities, Parliament Hill and downtown, or by car to Gatineau and Highway 417. And with green spaces and recreational pathways at my doorstep, Walkscore rates my location a Walker's Paradise (91), Excellent Transit (88), Biker's Paradise (99).

The space
A private sunny room with a very comfortable full-sized bed. Your bedroom is on the second floor (overlooking a quiet space) and next to the shared bathroom.
If your party would like more space, I have an additional quiet bedroom next to this one. Please book under separate listing.

Guest access
On the main floor, you will have shared access to the kitchen and dining room. Feel free to borrow picnic dishes for a meal at the park or at

name: 3 Bdr Exec home near Aiport w Luxury Master suite
description:

In the summer enjoy the landscaped backyard with swing, lounge sofa and dining area with gas bbq. In the winter enjoy the nearby toboggan, skating and cross-country ski trails then warm up in the luxury roman tub in the master suite. My home is ideal for couples, business travelers, and families with children.

Guest access
Full home accesss

Other things to note
Street parking is not prohibited. Maximum 2 vehicles per guest visit.

description:
This beautiful piece of paradise situated on 10 acres boasts a small lake great for swimming and fishing in the summer and skating in the winter. Your view to the forest will likely include wild turkeys, deer, otters and birds galore. You will have a large room with a patio door and small private deck. Two very comfortable twin beds and your own large bathroom round out your accommodations. This relaxing country living is only 25 minutes from downtown Ottawa and 10 minutes to the CTC.

The space
If peace, serenity, nature and quality appeal to you, come to Driftwood. This beautiful bungalow has stone floors throughout and a bright open concept living, dining and kitchen area. A large southern facing deck with BBQ area has fabulous views of the lake. Your room is large with 2 very comfortable twin beds, a large closet, desk, patio doors opening to a small private deck looking out to the forest. A sparkling clean private bathroom is all yours.

You will be joining me in my comfortable and attractive home in the centre area of Ottawa. Myself or another family member will greet you. I rent one other room on Airbnb so there may be another guest at the same time.

name: Downtown Condo Steps Away From Parliament Hill
description:
Beautiful, modern one-bedroom apartment, in the heart of downtown:

Great location: 10-minute walk to Parliament Hill and Rideau Canal.

- Queen bed
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Modern decor
- Very clean
- Large balcony with 2 lounge chairs to sit out and relax
- Close to everything (Elgin Street & Somerset) lots of restaurants and shops
- Wi-Fi included
- Free street parking (Mon-Friday after 5:30pm, and all day Sat-Sun)
- Grocery store (3 blocks down on Somerset)
- Wine Shack is on the corner

name: Beautiful Farmhouse Ottawa - ISOLATE HERE
description:
ATTENTION: DURING THE COVID 19 PANDEMIC WE HAVE IMPLEMENTED ADDITIONAL CLEANING AND DISINFECTING PROCEDURES.

This century home is available for your enjoyment, it is close to the city, yet has a country atmosphere. Free parking and easy access to the 416 make it a perfect stop over point for visiting the nations capital. The home has a master bedroom with queen sized bed and attached bathroom access. The 2nd bedroom has a double bed. Central air conditioning throughout.

The space
Quiet and comfortable with many matures trees. Very secluded and private in a country setting just minutes from the city. Nestled on mature country estate, overlooking the river across the road.

Free parking. Ample parking for vehicle and trailer. Storage available if needed while visiting the city.

Smoking is not permitted inside however guests are welcome to smoke outside. There is a nice deck, with a propane BBQ, and a fire pit

name: Cozy 1 Bedroom in Centretown Ottawa
description:
Stylish & cosy 1 bedroom condo on the top (5th) floor of the Centropolis Building on Kent Street at Gladstone. Unit features beautifully curated artwork by local artists! Only steps away from wonderful restaurants, bars, pubs, cafes, grocery stores, LCBO & retail shops!

The space
This very central condo is only about 2 blocks from the Greyhound Bus Station with easy access to Highway 417. Avis Rent-a-Car (URL HIDDEN) is conveniently located directly across the street from building. The unit includes a parking spot in the heated underground garage. It is walking distance to & from Parliament Hill, federal government offices, parks, Sparks Street, the Rideau Centre, the Shaw Centre, Ottawa's historic Byward Market, City Hall, the Canal & Ottawa University. Convenient public transit access right outside the door!

Guest access
-in suite laundry
-beautiful rooftop patio with lounge chairs, picnic tables & communal BBQs (open from May to Sep

description:
Located in Britannia, close to downtown Ottawa, close to shopping center, malls bike path, beach, parks, restaurants, theatre (Cineplex), yacht club, hospitals. Smoke & pet free environment. 1 free parking spot, close to public transit & much more

The space
Over-looking Park land with over sized windows inviting the outdoors in
Everything under one roof!
Spacious - open concept / kitchen dinning & living area
Suitable for business travelers, couples, solo, or adventurers
Very Private setting

Please note there are two sets of stairs to access the condo

name: The GREENBERG FLAT - BRAND NEW - Mid Century -
description:
Welcome to the Greenberg Flat. We have created this space for the urban dweller who appreciates simple and clean lines. And although we did not collaborate with Herman Miller on furniture pieces, we found the next best Ottawa designer at Wiseman & Cromwell who helped us pick unique pieces to go with that “Mid Century Modern” phrase everyone keeps using. We hope you enjoy your stay with us at The Art House Airbnb.

The space
We purchased this 1890's victorian mansion with a dream to restore and renovate the property into 3 charming and distinct apartments. We wanted to create a unique guest experience, each apartment was designed with a different theme in mind. All our of units are adorned with works from local artists all available for purchase.


The Art House Airbnb is ideally located in the heart of Centretown, walking distance to all the city has to offer. Whether its attending a meeting or conference in the business district, catching a concert

description:
Bedroom w/ 1 real double bed in quiet neighborhood. Close to highway and bus stops. Freshly painted room with cute decor and a very comfortable bed. Shared access to full bathroom (next to bedrooms) and half-bath (main floor). TV but no cable; can connect laptop with HDMI. Wifi available. Living room/dinning room or our outdoor deck is perfect for unwinding. Kitchen and cooking ware available, as long as everything is cleaned out right after use.

The space
Modern yet cozy house. Come and see for yourself :)

Guest access
You have access to the whole main floor, and to your bedroom and the bathroom on the second floor. You can also relax on our patio or in the park right behind the house.

Please don't go into basement, and master bedroom.

Other things to note
SMOKING + USE OF DRUGS IS FORBIDDEN (INCLUDING MARIJUANA)
NO EXTERNAL GUEST ALLOWED

name: CanalView, Immaculate, Self Contained 2 bdrm, 3bed
description:
Great location, self-contained, flat in the heart of the Golden Triangle. The stairs to the canal are only a one minute walk... if you take your time!

Perfect downtown location for shopping, seeing the sites, night life, dining out, concerts, and exploring the recreational paths! Just blocks away from the business district and the Shaw Centre -- walk everywhere!

Everyone in the building has committed to having ONLY those people registered enter the home. Masking mandatory in the lobby.

The space
Gorgeous, fully equipped, 2 bedrooms with a 3rd bed in the living room. Balcony with canal-view. We will deliver groceries and any other necessities to you if you are isolating. If you want a private entrance and more room, you can rent the top floor for an additional 2000$ per month... normally 3000 per month

Guest access
You have access to second floor of the house, the stairs and lobby, 1 washer, one dryer. You will

name: NEW Modern 2-Bedroom Executive Townhome in Kanata
description:
This gorgeous new Executive Townhome is located in South Kanata, and comes complete with a fully furnished kitchen with great sized balcony, tastefully decorated living area, and two bedrooms with super comfy queen-size beds and high-end linens.

This location is close to many shopping centres, fine restaurants and is just 10 minutes away from The Canadian Tire Centre.

The space
This brand new executive town home is sure to please. It contains all new furniture, Hardwood floors, and plush carpet throughout. Start off your morning with a fresh coffee on the balcony over looking the ravine.

Amenities include:
- Fridge, Stove, Dishwasher, Microwave
- Washer and Dryer
- Dishes and cutlery
- Pots and Cooking Utensils
- Kitchen and bath towels
- A/C
- Paper toiletries
- High quality pillows and bedding
- Complimentary Tea and Coffee
- Iron and Ironing board
- Hair dryer
- Free Wifi<

name: Sunny, Bright unit in a Family Friendly Home
description:
Clean, fully equipped 2 bedroom upstairs unit of a duplex. The perfect place from which to explore our Nation's Capital. Free parking for up to 1 vehicles. Only a 10-15 min drive to Parliament Hill (Uber ~10.50), 5 mins from Via Rail Train Station (Uber ~6.10), 10 mins or less to the Byward Market (Uber ~7.50), and 20 mins from the Airport (Uber ~22.00). Bus stop is a 2 min walk, located at either end of the street and is a 15 min ride to the Rideau Center and Parliament Hill.

The space
Bright and clean, this is the perfect location from which to explore our beautiful city. We are very family-friendly and can provide a bassinet, travel crib, highchair etc so you can pack less! Within close walking distance to St. Laurent Mall, restaurants and several parks. Our backyard is the envy of many and we would love to share it will you. We are on site in the downstairs unit of this duplex and are avalible 24/7 to help make sure your stay is truly enjoyable.

name: Trendy Westboro home minutes from downtown Ottawa
description: Welcome to our cool, modern home in the heart of Westboro; walking distance to trendy boutiques and local artisan restaurants.  Minutes from the downtown core, this house boasts all the features you'd expect in a new modern home; there's little left to be desired.  From the gourmet kitchen with stainless steel Thermador appliances, to the open concept design, we're confident your stay will be nothing less than unforgettable.

name: Elegant 1 Bdrm Apt Retreat Downtown
description:
Perfect downtown location for shopping, seeing the sites, night life, dining out, concerts, and exploring the recreational paths! Just blocks away from the business district, Shaw Centre, Lansdowne -- walk everywhere!

Please note that the calendar might show your dates are not available, but they probably are! Please reach out to us.

Everyone in the building has committed to having ONLY those people registered enter the home. Masking mandatory in the lobby.

The space
The Loft is an airy space on the top floor of a heritage home. 1 Parking spot, an equipped kitchen, private bathroom and living room, cozy bedroom, and a sofa bed for two extra guests. You have private access to the suite.

Top of the line Samsung ductless air conditioner, installed July 2017, is controlled by you. You can set it to cool or just to dehumidify or just use the fan. You decide what will make you comfortable.

The Loft is perfect for 1 or

name: 1 Bedroom - Downtown, Byward Market - FREE PARKING
description:
Cozy apartment situated on a quiet street in the heart of downtown Ottawa! The ideal location for anyone interested in exploring everything the city has to offer! Ideal for couples and business travelers.

** Queen Bed & Futon **

** FREE PARKING AVAILABLE! **

Excellent place to stay for Ottawa Race Weekend, Canada Day, Winterlude, RBC Bluesfest, Canadian Tulip Festival, O

description:
Beautifully sunlit lower level of my split level home. Two separate bedrooms, with one double bed in each. One bathroom with shower. Access to living area with an eating area and a large sectional couch that sleeps one comfortably.

My home is in a quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood which is a short drive or bus ride to downtown or the market.
It is perfect for groups of friends (no parties please!), families, or even couples looking for a getaway with more space.

The space
You will be staying a ten minute drive from downtown. The parliament buildings can be seen from the front porch.
The bedrooms and living space are downstairs in the lower level.

Guest access

Other things to note
Please read: If you require the second bedroom you need to book for 3+ people. If the booking is set to 1 or 2 guests only one bedroom will be available. T

description:
Centrally located in the golden triangle, this modest sized but cozy unit with a private entrance is hidden away at the rear of an old Victorian. Steps to the Canal and Elgin St with all its cafes and restaurants. A short walk / bike to downtown, parliament and the Byward Market. You can see the Canal from the front of the house! Bring your runners, roller blades or walking shoes. Fully equipped kitchen. Flowers by the private sitting area are in full bloom from spring into the summer.

The space
Private Patio space to relax in after a long day exploring. Full size Parking. Private entrance. Chemical sensitive -- Always cleaned with zero VOC all natural products except for only the most stubborn stains. Not that you'd have to so close to a plethora of amazing restaurants but if your passion is cooking you've found the right place with a fully stocked kitchen. Large windows on both sides of the living room allow for a comfortable cross breeze.

description:
Please note that the pool is now closed for the season.
Prepare your meals in this expansive kitchen with the help of professional grade appliances and enjoy dining by the open Napoleon fireplace or alfresco poolside. Rejuvenate in the private hot tub steps from the back door. Each bedroom has its own unique style and embodies comfort. Climb into the sumptuous beds topped with silky duvets and memory foam pillows. There's a freestanding tub for moments of solace with candlelight and bubbles at your fingertips. Wake up, slip into the fluffy robes provided and enjoy your coffee in comfort.

The in law suite is located in the lower level of a large home in Orleans in the East end of Ottawa.The in-law suite has a bedroom (double bed) w/desk & television ; living room w/fireplace & a fold down sofa suitable for 1 person and a television. Fully equipped kitchen. The laundry is on the same level & the full bathroom is private for the use of the in law suite guests only. Lovely back yard. Guests can use the exercise room equipped w/treadmill, exercise bike, elliptical & weights, etc.

The space

Two blocks from the River bikepaths and 2 bicycles can be borrowed from the host. There is also a rush hour express bus behind the home and the main public transitway with buses every 3 minutes is a pleasant 7 minute walk (Place d'

A separate Murphy bed room can also be booked if 2nd person prefers own room or 3rd person in which case you would share bathroom with that additional person in your party. Guest access

Use of the home (kitchen, dining room, living room, laundry and backyard as well as lower level gym). Parking included. There is also a Smart TV in the room with Netflix and Cable.

name: Family Home Right Off Eastern 417
description: Looking for a getaway to Ottawa this winter and wanting an affordable place to call your own?   Look no further.   I have an 1800 square foot home with a finished basement, ideal for a family of 4 and up to 6!   Right off the eastern 417 and inside the Greenbelt - close to all major amenities (15 minutes from Parliament Hill) with all appliances available for your use (including an InstaPot)!   Drop me a line to make arrangements!

Bright, two bedroom, 2ND FLOOR APARTMENT in the Wellington Village/Westboro area of Ottawa. The apartment is a totally SEPARATE unit on the second floor of our home with private access. Our home is located in a desirable, quiet family neighborhood, and yet literally only steps away from the many shops and restaurants that make the area so unique. We are location only a 10 min drive from the downtown core, 5 min drive from Tunney's Pasture.
MAXIMUM 4 people allowed to stay at property

The space
WE ARE ONLY ACCEPTING BOOKINGS FOR A MINIMUM OF 4 NIGHT STAYS.
You will find a well cleaned apartment on check in, we only ask that when you leave it is left in a tidy manor.
Our apartment is accessed from a private door on the driveway side of our home. The entrance leads into a small landing and then a stairway up to the 2nd level apartment. It is a bright space with many windows. The apartment encompasses the whole 2nd level of our home, approx 765 sq ft.

description:
Cozy, bright and quiet apartment in the Glebe next to Lansdowne Park and TD place with a private parking spot to the right of the entrance with a jump up onto a small curb. Entire apartment is newly designed and furnished for AirBnB. 24 hr security. AC and in-floor heating system. One minute walk to public transit.
Living area is upstairs and the bathroom and bedroom are downstairs – with a comfortable 6’ 6” ceiling (see pics). Laundry facilities in the unit.

The space
We have created this space with the tired traveler in mind. The kitchen is fully equipped to handle any cooking challenge. The downstairs bedroom is warm and inviting with a new IKEA bed and mattress. Laundry can be done in the suite.

Guest access
Guests can access the entire suite and the parking spot to the right of the door is exclusive to the suite. We are working with the city to lower the curb but until then it's a small jump up into the spot!

name: Comfortable basement stay right next to Downtown!
description:
Close to Downtown (just on the edge so you get a good price for your stay! but still a short bus-ride away and even shorter drive - 10 min) and next the the marvelous Ottawa river parkways (speedy way to get to the tourist attractions downtown). Close to a mall, convenience stores, buses, light rail transit (LRT) station, includes parking on a private driveway, kitchenette and laundry. Stay for a short trip or longer for work/ house hunting etc. - Montfort/NRC/CSIS and La Cite College nearby!.

The space
Check out the video tour of the place! https://youtube.com/watch?v=72DWgXp7ttI

Layout of the Building/Units and Note on Occupancy. - i.e. non-private common areas in this AirBnB rental.
-------------------------------------------------
There are two units in this property, main floor (Unit A is not available) and basement (Unit B). Both have separate entrances and amenities. This ad is for the BASEMENT rooms as displayed in all pictures.

name: Beautiful, modern, sun-filled 3-bedroom Glebe home
description:
Our serene, modern, sun-filled 3-bedroom home is in the centre of the Glebe, just a few blocks from the Rideau canal and a 5-minute walk to trendy Bank Street, Lansdowne Park, theatres, and excellent nightlife. We’re also directly across the street from a small neighbourhood park with wonderful mature trees, soccer field, and children's playground.

The space
The house includes touches from our time living in Australia, Bali, Dubai, and India. Our well-stocked gourmet kitchen is a dream to cook in and enjoy family time in a beautiful space. The ground floor has ample space for relaxing and entertaining, and is drenched with natural light during the day (we’ve often been told that the space has a “zen” feel).

The house has three bedrooms, including master with a queen bed, ensuite bathroom, and walk-in closet. On the second floor there’s also has a small bay area with windows looking onto the park that we use as an office.

The third floor of

name: Cute & Cozy Private Apartment
description:
Newly renovated and well maintained private, one bedroom basement apartment with separate entrance.

Steps to coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, bike paths, major highways and transit lines. Centrally located and within 15 minute drive downtown or 15 minute drive to Kanata (Canadian Tire Centre). We take pride in our space and we know you will love it as much as we do. Don't delay, book your stay! Timely responses guaranteed.

The space
Our basement apartment was recently renovated in the summer of 2018 and has modern finishes, fully equipped kitchen, upgraded bathroom with stand up shower and laundry facilities. We assure that guests of all types will feel at home in this cozy, tastefully decorated, one bedroom apartment.

We are a young family and enjoy hosting other families. We can provide a pack and play for younger children to sleep safely and a Bumbo seat with tray for feeding. If any of these items are required, please let us know up

Located one block away from the shops and restaurants on Bank Street. Our one bedroom flat in a hundred and fifty year old heritage home has plenty of character with high ceilings, Hollywood Kitchen with all the cooking supplies. Queen size bed, hardwood floors and European bathroom design. Living area has a sofa bed for extra sleeping area. Very comfortable for 2 people.

The space
Our flat is private, quite, clean & comfortable. Located on the main floor of a 3 storey heritage building, hardwood floors, high ceiling with plenty of character & charm.

Guest access
There is a laundry room in the building if you need.

Other things to note
Ottawa is a beautiful city with so much to offer that we hope when you visit you have the time to explore it.

description:

The space
Our family of four live in the upstairs part of the house.

Guest access
Wifi, cable, backyard, patio, BBQ

Other things to note
We have two dogs (under 3 years old) that live in the main part of the house. You may see them when you are exiting/entering the back gate and they happen to be in the backyard. They are harmless, but can be yappy when someone they don't know is entering 'their' house. Sorry in advance if they bark at you. They are all bark and no bite. We can supply treats that you can throw at them and they will love you forever.

description:
My place is located west Ottawa, 25 minute drive to down town Ottawa and 12 minutes to the Canadian Tire Centre. I have up to 4 different rooms that can be rented (if not in use already, check other listings). You’ll love my place because of the location, free Wi-Fi, free parking and continental breakfast. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids). The light continental breakfast is free and includes, toast, milk, juice, cereal and fruit.

Guest access
Travellers will be able to access a large common area equipped for guests to make light meals, happy hour and enjoy the fireplace.

description:
This 700-square foot semi-sunk basement suite has large south and west windows that flood it with light throughout the day. It has a large kitchen, bedroom, full bath, and living room, including all the necessary amenities for a long or short stay. It is clean and tastefully decorated, with a small but eclectic library for you to peruse during your stay. In the warmer months, enjoy the patio and large garden (including the fresh herbs!).

The space
The suite has a dishwasher because, let's be honest, who does dishes on vacation? It also has a projector (no TV) to watch movies directly from your laptop. The suite is accessed via a flight of stairs.

description:
Semi-detached, 3 bedroom house in very central Sandy Hill. Steps to University of Ottawa, walking distance to Parliament Hill, shops. Ideal for business travelers, couples, families, vacations, extended stays. Near nightlife, restaurants, public transit, parks and Rideau Centre. Fully renovated kitchen, Netflix, Free Internet, Wifi.

Our prices are HST inclusive which is a big advantage for business travellers

The space
Our place is close to all attractions in Ottawa and right next to Uottawa but at the same time tucked away on a quiet beautiful street. We have recently installed new windows so that the house is nice and airy. We keep house spotless and get it professionally cleaned after every stay. Kitchen is well stocked with essential utensils, spices, cooking oil, cereal, oatmeal, coffee, tea, creamer, and much more. Lots of fresh towels in the bedrooms. Beds always have fresh sheets & pillow cases. We love to make your stay a great experience.

Newly renovated bright and sunny third floor modern apartment, ( March 2017) with a large newly furnished private balcony. This apartment is solely used for Airbnb guests only, no clutter, luxury hotel feel!
Clean, brand few furnishing with appliances and decor. On site laundry. Located close to Little Italy, Westboro, Lebreton Flats (blues fest),minutes from downtown. The apartment fits 4 guests comfortably as there is a queen size bed and a sofa bed. Perfect for small groups or families!

The space
** FREE PARKING**
Brand new! Professionally designed and decorated, great neighborhood.

Other things to note

PLEASE PARK AT THE FRONT OF THE BUILDING TO THE LEFT (as close to the porch & directly in front of a sign that says ‘139 PARKING’)
The right side of the space is not my property and you will get ticketed otherwise.

- It is $20/night for every guest after the first 2 guests, so please enter the guest count correctly from the beginning, and the system will show you the accurate price.

- This is a private, separate-entrance basement apartment of a house. The

Highch

The second bedroom has a double bed, bedside table and built
