Très grand appartement dans un immeuble ancestral ! Vous aurez beaucoup d'espace avec une cuisine, une salle à manger, une chambre, un salon et un balcon, idéal pour profiter des chaudes soirées! Un appartement parfait pour un couple amoureux des belles choses !

The space
Our apartment is located on the top floor of an Heritage building. We have a lots of light and a lots of plants! The apartment includes a big kitchen, a dining-room with a table for 4, a bathroom with a bathtub, your bedroom, our bedroom (which will be locked and not accessible), our big cozy living-room and finally a front balcony !
Ideal for a couple who wants to experience what Ottawa has best to offer ! We are located on Elgin.

Notre appartement es

name: Happy, hippie, urban vegan space
description:
Vegans Welcome! MEAT-FREE PLEASE! Small, modest, clean home.
Full kitchen: dishes & appliances. Coffee for guests. WiFi and lots of space to sit, read, rest or work.
Not fancy but welcoming. Light and bright! Lovely front garden with table and chairs to sit outdoors. Located in the awesome neighbourhood of Hintonburg with all your heart could desire: cool shops, micro-brew pubs, restaurants and more. 4 km to Byward Market. Near bus routes. 20 min to Gatineau Park. One small parking space.

Guest access
The whole house is available with the exception of my personal bedroom. This door will be closed.

Other things to note
If you are sensitive to synthetic fragrances (as I am), know that I do not use any synthetic perfumes, scented laundry detergents or dryer sheets in my house. All of my cleaning products are natural. Your nose is safe here!

name: Gorgeous, spacious, central 3 bedroom beauty
description:
Beautiful spacious executive family home in the central Civic Hospital/Wellington neighborhood. Large, well equipped kitchen and entertaining area, sleeping for 8 incl finished basement with double futon and extra bathroom. Patio and bbq, parking for 2 cars, central to everything. Families, friends and pets welcome.

Guest access
You will have access to the full home, I will not be there.

name: Constance Bay sandy beach paradise
description:
In the SUMMER, we ONLY rent FULL WEEKS Sunday to Sunday

Welcome to beautiful Constance Bay, a little piece of paradise only 20 minutes from Kanata, and 45 minutes to downtown Ottawa. This magical boutique is on the Ottawa River, and features a sandy waterfront with very gradual entry, which is perfect for both young and old. There are miles of sandy beaches to walk and explore, which make you feel like you are worlds away, but should you need to come into Kanata, it's a short 20 minute drive.

The space
The cottage has just been fully renovated top to bottom, with no expense spared. There are new huge windows over-looking the sandy beach and water with Gatineau Hills in the backdrop, quartz countertops in the open-concept kitchen (open to both dining and living room), large bathroom with separate toilet area, beautiful furniture, and luxurious beds. The list goes on and on. This is not your typical cottage; this is more like a beautiful pinterest h

name: Kanata-Beaverbrook gem!
description:
This three bedroom single detached house built in old Kanata on a large lot, now part of the city of Ottawa, is just minutes from the Canadian Tire Centre and high-tech companies as well as the Carling Campus of the National Defence Headquarters and Westley Clover Equestrian Park and 1/2 hour drive to downtown Ottawa. There is a beautiful garden, in season, to enjoy. Breakfast is included or snacks, special requests can be made -- gluten-free, sugar-free, vegan.

The space
House is 1800 square feet, with two stories. The large lot is completely fenced in, also with a hedge for complete privacy. Please no smoking in my home.

Guest access
There are four bedrooms but one of them stores my personal belongings and is locked. The basement is also off limits. The rest of the house is available for guests.

Other things to note
Please no smoking and no parties. Check-in 3 p.m. Check-out 11 a.m.

name: Peaceful and Friendly Home in Ottawa
description:
Enjoy Ottawa! Welcome to this nice and clean home with a comfortable bedroom and plenty of space. Free Parking and Wi-Fi. Conveniently located close to public transportation, shopping, restaurants, coffee shops and just 12 km to the heart of downtown Ottawa, and important tourist attractions.

The space
One Level Home

Guest access
Kitchen, Bathroom, Living Room, Parking.

Other things to note
Check in not later than 10 PM, otherwise arrange 2 days ahead.

name: 2br+ BEAUTY in the GLEBE at Lansdowne. A+ Location
description:
Beautiful and bright 2+ bedroom in an unbelievable location, just a 2 minute walk from Lansdowne Park & TD Place in the heart of the hip and historic Glebe. You have got to see the newly renovated kitchen with granite counters, it’s equipped with everything you need to cook up a gourmet meal with the ingredients you bought at the Whole Foods Market 2 blocks away. Two bedrooms with queen beds: the 3rd floor loft bedroom is beautiful and bright thanks to two big skylights. More below!

The space
You're still with us? Good! Where were we.. Have we mentioned the Den yet? It has a comfy day bed to curl up and read a book and a desk in case your work has followed you to Ottawa. The den is basically a 3rd bedroom. The day bed conveniently converts into a 3rd queen bed. The sliding doors off the Den take you right onto the exterior deck where you can chill out with a cold glass of just about anything. Parking spot is included at the front of the house.

Full re

name: FREE PARKING - Downtown Bohemian Bachelor
description:
Quiet bohemian style bachelor apartment located right downtown. This space is very cosy/minimal, with a single bed, and suitable for only 1 guest. Within walking distance to University of Ottawa, Byward Market, Rideau St, Parliament Hill, many Embassy's as well as many other sites. Grocery store and coffee shop right around the corner. There is a direct bus route from the airport to the Sandy Hill neighbourhood. Warm feeling environment decorated in bright, warm colours including modern art.

The space
Cozy space suitable for one traveller because it has a single bed. This apartment is located in the Sandy Hill neighbourhood, right downtown near the Byward Market and University of Ottawa. Has all amenities for business travel such as an iron and hangers, as well as anything else you may need.

Guest access
The bed is a single bed. You may use the fridge/freezer, dishes (pots, pans, ice trays, plates, cutlery, etc.) and all cooking appliance

name: Great location in friendly neighbourhood
description:
Unit with private bathroom and entrance. 10 min drive, 20 min bus ride or 45 min bike ride to downtown. 2 minute drive to College Square shops and restaurants.

Owners have a cat and dog in the house but the pets will never be in the unit for rent while guests are there.

The space
The unit has a sofa, loveseat, coffee table, end table, dining table/desk, TV, wifi, cable, mini fridge, toaster oven, coffee maker, microwave, double bed, closet, dresser, roll away double bed, and private bathroom in the unit.

There is also a shared kitchen shown in the photos and a private entrance through the kitchen. There is laundry facilities in the unit and parking for two cars on the premises.

The backyard is completely fenced in and has a deck with BBQ and patio table and chairs.

Guest access
Guests have access to the main kitchen, backyard, parking lot and entire basement unit.

name: Bright Bedroom for Two - One bus to town centre
description:
Large and bright main floor bedroom with Queen size bed. Brand new mattress and bedding.

The space
Brand new mattress and bedding in this lovely and bright main floor bedroom. Private four piece bathroom is on the second level, main floor (shared) 1/2 bath right outside the door. This bedroom has a comfy chair and a crib in the room for guests traveling with an infant.

Guest access
Guests can access most of the house except for our private bedroom and bathroom. Shared access to the TV with cable, no private TV in room - negotiation on programming! Feel free to use the kitchen/dining room if required. Let us know if you need anything!

Other things to note
Breakfast can be included, if needed, at no extra charge. Please let us know in advance if you will be needing breakfast provided.

name: ★ PARKING + AC + 2BDR ★ Modern Living On Main ★
description:
Our top floor two bedroom condo is perfect for couples, friends, or families. Our home comes with central air and parking. Think open concept, tall windows, and hardwood floors. Decorated from a minimalist design. Built in a fresh building with a secure entrance. Set in an up and coming neighborhood. Ottawa never looked this good.

The space
The full bathroom includes shampoo, conditioner and body wash to use at your convenience.

Guest access
Coin-operated laundry machines are accessible in the building for your use as well.

Other things to note
We're located on the top floor which allows for a lot of privacy. Which also means stairs. Six flights to be exact. Our fire alarm is sensitive when cooking, but you simply head to the main entrance of the building to shut it off, if need be. The air conditioner intake is in the second bedroom. It is noisy when the AC is on. We're in the process to have is repaired. Thank you f

name: Studio room in Wellington West
description: Well lit basement room with private entrance, fully equipped kitchenette, private washroom with shower, access to laundry, and parking included. Located in trendy Wellington West with shops and good eating around the corner. Close to transit station, downtown, bike paths, parkway, Ottawa river, and highway access.

name: Cozy home close to Ottawa Airport
description:
My modern home is located 5-7 minutes away from the airport and a 15-20 minute drive from downtown Ottawa. My home is in a great neighbourhood that is close to parks, grocery stores and restaurants. My home is good for couples and business travelers. Two parking spaces included.

The space
My guests can access ground floor (dining/living room/ fully equipped kitchen with 5 appliances), powder room. First level has three bedroom , two guests bedroom and the third bedroom is not available to guests.

name: SPACIOUS AND COZY 1 BEDROOM CONDO
description:
A perfect location with public transportation right at your door leading you straight to the heart of Downtown Ottawa or a 15 minute drive by car.

The space
It's a very cozy one bedroom, one bath apartment in a brand new building with wood and tiles throughout the living space and bathroom. The apartment is fully equipped with all the essentials you need in your kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. The bedroom has a queen size bed with plenty of closet space and the living space has a couch with a large TV which you can stream with the Netflix service. An air mattress can be provided in the common space if required. The building is brand new and quiet, it’s easily accessible to the OC Transpo (94 Bus) which will bring you directly downtown (25 minutes) and to the East/West end of the city directly. There is parking on site which is included. The apartment get cleaned by professional services after each guest leaves.

Guest access
The place has a l

name: Ottawa Peaceful Room, free parking, pool
description:
15-min drive to Ottawa downtown. The bedroom, located on the 2nd floor, is equipped with a double-sized bed and work desk. Private garden. Bring your swimming suit.

The space
Guests have access to the kitchen (i.e. fridge, oven, microwave, toaster, pots and pans, dishwasher, etc.), living room, garden, pool. Free parking. Free WiFi.

Other things to note
Several pamphlets such as Gray Line Sightseeing, Residence of the Governor General of Canada, Canada National Museums, Ottawa Festivals, Canadian Museum of Nature, Byward Market Map, etc. are available.

name: Trendy and Sparkling Bungalow
description:
4 adults maximum (no limit on kids), & pets welcome! Free Parking and a 10 min drive to downtown! Located centrally beside the experimental farm, enjoy a backyard, a modern kitchen and open living space. The home is cozy, well decorated, and clean. It is a small bungalow, 500 sq. ft, not including the basement. It's the perfect base for your stay in Ottawa, especially if you want to get downtown quickly. Take a direct bus or jump in an Uber for $10! Food options in walking distance.

The space
We offer one bedroom upstairs with a comfy queen sized bed, one bedroom with a closed sliding barn door in the basement with a firm queen bed, as well, in the basement is a toilet and laundry sink (yes! it's as fancy as it sounds but no climbing stairs in the middle of the night at least!) and a super comfy sofa bed in the living room that easily pulls in and out with all the linens and bedding provided. There is another single bed on the basement level. The main floor

name: Central: Between Byward Market & Rockliffe.
description:
On a quiet dead-end street in a historic neighbourhood, a short walk from the Byward Market, Parliament Hill and the homes of the Prime Minister, the Governor General and the world's Ambassadors. Two blocks from Rideau street's diverse restaurants, bars and shops.

Big character apartment with large, bright living room with a dinner table, TV, and plenty of comfortable seating. Fully stocked kitchen with dishwasher and washer (dryer in building). Cheery three-piece bathroom with tub.

The space
This is my fulltime home and full of things that are near and dear to me. I hope you enjoy my space as much as I do.

I have a 🐈 (who won't be there when you are)

name: Cozy 2 bedroom apartment in hintonburg
description:
Cute 2 bedroom apartment nestled between award winning cafes and restaurants, yoga studio, and close to the parliament of Canada, downtown , little Italy , recently renovated, new appliances. Located in the popular hintonburg neighbourhood. Close to highway and bus routes. No pets or smoking allowed.

The space
Clean and Cozy space, with complete private access to Apartment .

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours for your stay and not shared with the host. Parking available for 1 car.

Other things to note
There is plenty of choice in restaurants and cafes nearby for all budgets. If you are eating in, you will find grocery stores at the top of the street, including the Hintonburg Marché providing deli meat & cheese, local produce and healthy take out prepared meals; Bread by Us for fresh baked bread & pastries. The LCBO down the street provides wine, beer and spirits.

name: 1 Bedroom, own bthrm, near Ottawa General Hospital
description:
Updated older home in Alta Vista area, near the transit way, about 15 minutes from downtown. Close to bike path that runs along the Rideau River. It is lovely for a single person or couple that like peace and quiet once they get back to the house. There is small fridge, Kuerig coffee maker and kettle in the room, as well as a writing desk. The private bathroom is recently renovated and there is off road parking available.

The space
Double bedroom with closet space, good light control blinds and curtains. Looks onto beautiful quiet garden with lots of birds.
Private upgraded bathroom.

Guest access
Coffee and tea are provided as well as condiments.
There is a side range of home food delivery services available nearby.
There is a keyless keypad at the front door and I will provide the access code before you arrive.
Should you wish to leave your luggage to pick up for a late departure we can help with those arrangements.

description:
Enjoy our charming and spacious ranch style bungalow that is only a 20 minute drive from Ottawa International Airport and 30 minutes drive to downtown Ottawa. Relax in the peace and quiet, only minutes away from the heritage streets of Manotick.

Our house is located on a quiet dead-end street. Orchard Hollow Park is at the end of the street, right along the Rideau River.

This is the perfect property for anything from a weekend getaway to family outings.

The space
Approximately 2700 sq ft of living space (including the fully finished basement) with a light-filled sun-room and wrap-around porch.

Family area, dinning room and kitchen are located on main floor. A 55 inch smart LED TV is setup in family area. Network cable is provided if a guest wants a wired network connection!

Master bedroom has a queen size bed and an ensuite bathroom with disability access.

The second bedroom is also setup with a queen si

name: Spacious. Best Location! Near Canal & Parliament
description:
Abundant space in this unique, large, bright incredibly well located 3+ bedroom apartment. Only minutes on foot to the Canal, Parliament, museums, Shaw Center, Rideau Centre, embassies and the Byward Market urban UOttawa. Large private Front room, with bedrooms and bath tucked quietly away. Central kitchen and dining are perfectly communal. Great for short or long term stays. Perfect - family & quiet friends who want access to the heart of the city.

The space
Very large three bedroom 2nd floor apartment with full kitchen and bath. Abundance of light and on hardwood floors so we ask for courteous gentle moving about for people staying below.

Guest access
Full kitchen and bath. All apartment amenities.

name: Family Home Near Canal
description: A 100 year-old family home located in a central area of Ottawa near the canal, parks, bike paths, Landsdowne, and the downtown core.  A great location for a family to stay in Ottawa in any season!

name: Beautiful House - 15 Min from Downtown Ottawa
description:
Beautiful spacious house available for airbnb. Walking distance to Costco, LCBO, restaurants, movie theaters, spas and more. Beautiful kitchen, new appliances and nice patio for the spring/summer with BBQ and patio furniture.
15 to 20 minutes from Parliament Hill and downtown Ottawa, 15 minutes to the Canadian Tire Center (Go Sens Go!), 15 minutes from the airport. Close to the highway.

The space
Open concept space, high ceilings, luxurious kitchen and spacious house with a backyard.
Perfect for a family or business travel.
Free wifi, Free parking;
Fresh sheets, fresh towels, fresh linens;
Tassimo coffee maker, kettle;
Pots, pans, dishes and cutlery included in the house;
New washer and dryer;
Security camera targeted outside;

* For guests travelling with an infant, we have additional crib available and can install for your arrival if you let us know in advance.

Other things to note
Upstai

name: Family home near Dow's lake, parking & backyard
description:
Family-friendly free standing two-story home stay in Ottawa's lovely Civic Hospital neighbourhood. Offering up our home while out of town.

Accessible for couples or families with young children.

Please inquire if you have any specific requests. Host communicates in English, French and Spanish.

Home rules and guidebook provided upon booking.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to the kitchen area, including an electric stove top, oven, refrigerator, microwave, kettle, toaster, and more. Guests are also welcome to the dining, living rooms and backyard.

Free wifi and access to Netflix. Laundry services can be used. Pack-and-play and additional single blow-up mattress available.

Home includes:
- toys and sports equipment, yoga mats (young boys in the family)
- pack and play
- basketball net outside
- air-hockey table
- piano

description:
We are located near a provincial park beach and it is within walking distance. We are about 35 min. from downtown Ottawa!
In summer you have access to a shared backyard heated pool and shared hot tub.

The space
The house is a split level. TV and phone in your private bedroom.

Guest access
Pool, gazebo, hot tub, private room with shuffle board and piano

Other things to note
Private room has your own key for your lockable door.

New window with screens which opens for fresh air.

Heat and air conditioning!

name: Spacious comfortable apartment-private entrance
description:
Basement suite with your own private entrance. Hardwood floors. Non-smoking home.
10 minutes from train station and 15 minutes from the airport.
Stove top/microwave/ fridge/ coffee maker and kettle. Sandwich maker and skillet.
booster seat for toddler/ pack n'play for toddler or baby provided at no cost
laundry available - no charge.
Parking for one car. We are 10 minutes from downtown. Close to parks/ shopping and walking distance to General Hospital and Children's hospital.

laundry is available- washer and dryer
fully air conditioned- you set the temperature!
brightly lit basement, with windows that can be opened

wi fi included

2 bedrooms, bathroom (with laundry) and a large sitting area with sectional couch andTV,

name: Welcoming house
description:
La chambre qui peut loger un couple est une grande chambre contenant bureau de travail et petite table pour prendre un déjeuner et un Walking Closet.

Our lovely roommate is a good sized room in a quiet area.

La 2e chambre contient aussi un bureau de travail.
Le décor est modifié selon le besoin des visiteurs.

Bus stop is less than 5 minutes from the house. Please feel free to email if you have any questions!

Guest access
You will have access to your bedroom, shared bathrooms (1.5), kitchen and patio.

Other things to note
We also rent other bedrooms.

name: Chez Eva *entire place available in Feb + parking*
description:
This is a place of quiet, peace, relaxation and creativity. My home is totally furnished and very spacious to provide you with a comfortable home away from home - including a fully stocked kitchen, living room, bedroom with queen bed, reading den, books, etc. Lots of space, lots of light, and decorated lovingly. I love tidiness and interior decor. I live here with my partner, Eddie.

I speak a few languages and welcome people from around the world - look forward to meeting you!

The space
Quiet, clean, cute, very spacious townhouse decorated lovingly.

Guest access
- Bedroom (with small desk, lots of closet space)
- Shared bathroom upstairs (full bath and shower)
- Second bathroom downstairs that I rarely use (shower)
- Small backyard (table and chairs)
- Full kitchen (eat-in kitchen, big bay windows, fully stocked with all cooking tools, dishes, etc. - I will also have some snacks for you in the fridge/cupboard

description:
Luxury downtown apartment overlooking the business district of Ottawa.

The space
Clean, modern and luxurious appartment downtown Ottawa. Steps from parliament hill, many great restaurants, Rideau mall and plenty of bus stops.

Guest access
Guests will have private balcony access with scenic views over the Ottawa skyline.

name: Private room in rented townhouse
description:
This bedroom is located in a four bedroom home in which each bedroom may be rented separately, so, you may have the whole house to yourself, or you may be sharing the common spaces with others during your stay.
Main level: Shared Living room, Dining room, fully stocked Kitchen, Powder bathroom. There is also access to the rear deck & yard. Private bedroom.
Second Level: Three private bedrooms and shared Full bathroom.

description:
Spacious, bright, renovated detached home 3 km from the center of downtown with a large private rooftop deck with BBQ. Plenty of free parking, fully equipped accommodation with all the comforts of home. Ideal location for visiting Ottawa's highlights and attractions or simply for relaxing.

The space
We can sleep 6 very comfortably in the 3 closed bedrooms. We are centrally situated, walking distance to grocery stores, 1 block to transportation and just 4 km to the Parliament Buildings, the Byward market, and close to museums, restaurants and much more.
Free private parking on the premises. Whether for pleasure or business, it will surely satisfy your needs. Let us know if you have specific requirements and we will let you know how we can accommodate.

Guest access
Guests have access to the complete living space including free parking on the premises, the roof top deck and exterior balconies at all times.

name: Clean + Cozy Private Bedroom in New House

My cozy bedroom is in a brand new house that is tastefully decorated. All amenities and furniture are brand new. Ideal for two people with access to private washroom and ample street parking. Enjoy full access to a gourmet kitchen. Tea/coffee is provided for breakfast. Located on a quiet street and mins from Hwy 417, Canadian Tire Centre and Bells Sensplex.

The space
The house is newly constructed as of March 2017. Very modern and open concept. Street parking is always easily available and with no restrictions. The house is located minutes from Highway 417 with less than a 20 minute drive into the city and less than a 10-minute drive to the Canadian Tire Centre and Bell Sensplex.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their private bathroom, parking on the driveway, fully equipped gourmet kitchen with eat-in island, dining room, living room, front porch and laundry access.

*Looking for month-to-month or long term rentals only. * Send me a message if you wish to discuss pricing and bookings.

New Condo with upgraded Hardwood Flooring

1800 sq ft. four bedroom townhouse on quiet residential street in downtown Ottawa just steps from the Rideau River and parkland. Comfortably sleeps 12.

Walking distance from major attractions, restaurants/bars and walking/biking paths along the river and family friendly park.

Fully equipped kitchen including all major/minor appliances/dishware.

1 outdoor parking spot, 1 small indoor parking spot, street parking.

name: Airy Room (N. view), river near, (buses)
description:
A single home (3 rooms total avail) this is one of the 2 rooms upstairs (2nd storey ) that share one bathroom and a 3rd room is downstairs lower level, with a pvt shower. Furnished with single beds, linen and towel provided.
A short walk: to Ottawa River & Transit main artery (day/ni bus # 38, 39)and others. We've hosted international students for the past 10 years. Hosts / owners: Paul & Sue Ann

Other things to note
In the interest of the health and safety of all our guests, we are asking everyone to answer the following questions before they book:
• In the last two weeks, have you or anyone you live with traveled to any areas that have been impacted by COVID-19?
• Have you been diagnosed with, or suspect that you have contracted, COVID-19?
• Do you currently have any travel restrictions in your area due to COVID-19?
Thank you.

name: Elegant Edwardian Home in Town Centre
description:
Welcome to my lovely Edwardian home minutes away from Parliament Hill. While this beauty will take you back to a gentler era, the home is updated with all the mod cons. From the wood burning fireplace to the backyard urban oasis you and your friends are steps away from shopping, local bars, restaurants and museums and much more in Canada's capital city. At the end of the day you can retreat to this comfortable home to share your experiences and enjoy a good night's sleep.

The space
This elegant Edwardian home has the grace of its period with the modern conveniences. It is decorated for beauty and comfort so that after a busy day of sightseeing and activity you can retreat to its comforts. There are several outdoor spaces including a recently landscaped backyard urban oasis and several balconies and decks to watch the world go by or just to relax with a cup of coffee and a book.

Guest access
You will have a fully equipped kitchen with ever

name: Chalet 5 à 7
description:
An artful oasis in the heart of Ottawa's Centretown neighbourhood.

The space
Relax in its open concept lounge, dine in the breakfast nook, pour yourself a glass of wine, put on a record, and dive into a coffee table book.

You are steps away from Centretown's adorable Dundonald Park, Chinatown, and a 12 minute walk to the Glebe, Golden Triangle. A 15-minute walk from Downtown, and the Hintonburg neighbourhoods.

Whether you want a quiet space to read, or want to socialize with locals, my apartment is surrounded by helpful friends/neighbours, always happy to meet travellers, and offer pro-tips for enjoying the city and our neighbourhood.

Guest access

name: Large Sun-Filled 1-Bedroom w/ Parking and Yard
description:
Large and very private sun-filled 1-bedroom lower unit in a popular residential area and right on major bus lines for easy access to downtown. Tastefully decorated with an authentic African theme.

Great views and access to a lovely backyard with sun deck, lawn, and flowering gardens.

Lots of living space including separate living/dining/sunroom and kitchen/living room with very large sofa (with pull-out double bed).

Walking distance to Algonquin College, College Square, and Merivale Road.

Please note that we welcome well-behaved pets (and their owners :))!

This listing is for one bedroom with queen size bed. Our home is your home away from home. Whether you want private time in your room or want to relax in the shared spaces, the choice is yours. Parking is free on street.

name: The White House! Modern and fully equipped home!
description:
Whether you are traveling on business or pleasure, we know you have a choice and are honoured that you have selected our property for your lodging needs.
Located 15 min. from downtown, close to the bus station and many amenities, our home is in a quiet neighborhood. Our home has 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, 2 living areas, and a beautiful full kitchen. Relax in the master en-suite’s jet tub, take advantage of the reliable Wi-Fi , 2 TV’s .

The space
We have 3 bedrooms, and 7 beds: Master with a queen bed and en-suite with jet tub and shower, second bedroom with double bed, third bedroom with Double bed (couch). There is a full second washroom in the middle of the hall as well a washer and dryer. In the basement there is a small area for work out equipment, a fireplace and pull out queen sofa bed. On the main floor there is a powder room (1/2 bathroom), kitchen with 5 appliances, dining area, a small bar area and living room with a queen pull out couch, TV.

name: Peaceful & spacious bungalow near Ottawa downtown
description:
Enjoy a peaceful, comfortable stay near downtown Ottawa. Newly renovated, our bungalow is perfectly located close to public transit, food, downtown and shopping center. WiFi service included.

Please contact us with any questions, it's our pleasure to help make your Ottawa stay more enjoyable!

The space
Our bungalow is newly furnished and decorated with our guests in mind. You will find everything you need for a comfortable business or leisure trip. All 3 rooms come with a Queen bed and are professionally cleaned with consistent decors, fresh towels, soap, shampoo, conditioner, and other essentials. Free parking on site.

Guest access
First floor. Free parking space onsite for 2 cars.

name: Spacious and Spotless Downtown Apartment.
description:
Recently remodelled, extremely spacious & spotless apartment, located in the heart of Sandyhill, less than a 5 min walk to the Byward Market, Ottawa University, Grocery stores, Rideau Center, LCBO, beer store, bars, restaurants, banks, pharmacies, yoga studios, coffee shops & more. Approximately 1100 square feet with 2 bathrooms. Plenty of space for 6 people. Living room has blinds on all windows, a queen sofa bed, & closing doors to create a second bedroom. Free onsite parking. Great location!

The space
This beautiful heritage home has been covered into apartments with high ceilings and beautiful modern finishes. This apartment is unusually large and the family room can act as a second bedroom when you close the french doors.

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours - this is not a shared space.

Other things to note
Please note that this is a main floor apartment in a large building with other units, so at times yo

name: Beautiful *Crystal Clean* Studio Suite [Downtown]
description:
Enjoy this beautiful, clean, quiet condo in downtown Ottawa, perfect for self-distancing or working from home! This pristine suite comes with soaps, toiletries, extra towels, bedding & cooking essentials. TOUCHLESS/KEYLESS or KEY entry system, 43" smart TV+Netflix, wireless internet & laptop friendly work space. All new furniture & appliances including: double bed, leather futon, kitchen, in-suite washer/dryer & central A/C. Groceries & Pharmacy are half a block away.

The space
This studio suite and the condo building is new, clean, private and modern. Management ensures that all facilities and entryways in the building are sanitized regularly. The unit is a great place to relax and be alone yet is still close to everything! A special welcome to all travelers wanting to self distance/isolate and all essential service workers!

Walk to all city attractions including Parliament, Rideau mall, museums, canal, entertainment, Universities, Bank/Elgin St, & pu

description:
Luxury, Quality & Excellence in the heart of Stittsville/Kanata!
Gorgeous 1 BR apartment. Newly built house in a safe & quiet area. ~15 mins walk to Sens Stadium (Canadian Tire C.) 5 mins drive to Tanger outlet. VERY spacious (~1,400 sqf, much bigger than pics!). Open concept w/ dining area, living room, kitchen, bathroom & laundry, top-end furniture, 3 comfy Sofas, enjoy the backyard, patio & bbq in the summer. You get incomparable value!

Parties NOT allowed - Respect quiet time from 11 pm.

Private access from backyard using patio steps.

-Queen size bed with new mattress. Super comfy mattress!

-Full kitchen with stove-top, microwave, fridge, coffee maker, toaster, counter-top and Island

description:
Sunny and spacious, newly renovated 1-bedroom basement apartment offers amazing walkability and access to some of Ottawa's greatest amenities including Byward Market, National Art Gallery, and Rideau Hall. Located just off of Beechwood, this space is in close proximity to tons of coffee, culture and the city's bike trail system. Depending on season, lots of other local treats are just a bike or short drive away including RCMP Stables, Aviation and Space Museum, and Ottawa River Parkway system.

The space
If you've got young ones, Optimiste Park is a 3 minute walk and offers modern infrastructure including an outdoor pool, splash pad, rink , basketball court, and outdoor gym. We are also a 1-minute walk away from a sugar bush forest great for little hikes or a short run. Infant/child friendly amenities mat be available upon request.

Guest access
Guests will have access to their apartment.

description: Brightly lit, close to the Canada, Downtown, 1 Block from multitude of clubs, pubs and restaurants. Large Sunny Patio. Renovated bathroom with two person shower.

name: Cozy one bedroom in the Nation's Capital
description:
Warm and welcoming 2-storey town house located in the beautiful east end of Ottawa. Close to plenty of amenities and just a quick 12 minute drive to the heart of downtown Ottawa - the Byward Market and Parliament Hill. Come and experience comfort and in this clean home away from home.. Book now!

Please note that this is my home. I will not be present during your stay. But this is where I live.

I do a deep clean between guests.
Newly added portable AC unit in living room.

Apartment located in the heart of trendy West Wellington area, just west of downtown. Walking distance to great restaurants, grocery store, and bus stops. Tunney's Pasture station is 500 metres away.

Self check-in. Electronic lock code will be provided on your day of arrival.

The space
Please request parking upon booking. There's onsite parking for 1 car and plenty of street parking.

Kitchen, 1.5 bathrooms, and living room.

Guests have full access to the kitchen and living room on the main floor, as well as the lovely backyard. You will feel just like home in our

We follow all Covid-19 cleaning protocols diligently, and there is a minimum 24 hr break between bookings to ensure your safety.
This is a cozy, comfortable private space for adults or small families. It is a standalone apartment with no shared facilities or shared entrances. description:

The space
This listing is located on the ground level of a duplex. There is a second floor apartment as well. Both units have their own separate entrances and lots of privacy. These are not shared spaces. All listings have their own kitchenwear, linens and towels.

Guest access

name: Scandinavian School House - BRAND NEW
description:
The Scandinavian Schoolhouse is inspired by the Nordic design movement, characterized by minimalism and functionality. The apartment is a spacious 2 storey, 2 bedroom unit that is bright and eclectic. One of the main design elements is the use of Baltic Birch Plywood - we used this element throughout the entire unit, from the custom closets in the bedrooms and bathroom to the kitchen cabinets. We wanted to inject some whimsical accessories to provide a fun, family friendly and unique experience.

The space
This is our second renovation on a 1890’s heritage home located in Centretown. We wanted to create a unique guest experience, each apartment was designed with a different theme in mind. Again, each of our 3 apartments are furnished with local artist’s work, including Julian Garner (5ivecents), locally found antiques as well as many handmade items.

Guest access
Guest will have complete access to their own unique apartment.

name: Large Bright Room in Historic New Edinburgh
description:
Our character home backs onto the Rideau River. The backyard is wooded and leads to the Rideau river pathway! The pathway takes you to Sussex Drive, and to the falls , where (in the spring and summer) you can stop for a beer and taco. Afterwards, you can walk downtown to the parliament buildings.

We are a "real airbnb." Just a family trying to get by. Guarantee your room and bathroom will be clean--the rest of the home is at the mercy of two energetic boys LOL

The space
The room is bright and large, has hardwood floors, a queen sized bed, a desk and chair.

Guest access

There is free street parking; however, Monday to Friday you must move your car every 3 hours between 10 am and 5 pm.

Other things to note

Gone are the days of Grandma’s house, this Modern Farmhouse is a cozy 2 bedroom apartment where rustic meets industrial. Nestled in the back of this heritage home, county elements of board and batten, stained glass, warm wood and brick are off-set with modern matte black painted doors and cabinetry and copper accents. This farmhouse styled apartment incorporates the old and the new, the timeless and the modern. It’s sophisticated, yet simple. And it invites you to kick back and relax in comfort

name: Your place to call HOME at WESTBORO BEACH
description:
Welcome to our QUIET and UNCLUTTERED family home. Where you can relax in between visiting all that Canada's capital and our wonderful neighborhood have to offer! We list our place when we are away, therefore nearly the entire home is available to you and we are readily available by phone/email/text. With 4 bedrooms upstairs and a family room with pull out couch on the lower level, many options for sleeping arrangements exist. We welcome families and responsible adults, no loud parties thanks!

The space
Our home is a lovely updated 1960s semi-detached 4 bedroom home with 1 off-street parking space included. There are 2 bathrooms upstairs (ensuite with shower, and main with bath + shower), and a half-bath on the main level. Kitchen is stocked with pots/pans, dishes, utensils, stove/oven, microwave, blender, toaster and fridge/freezer. Washer and dryer are on the main level and available to guests. The home is child and baby-friendly and many baby items are availab

name: Luxurious century home w/ modern reno in the Glebe
description:
Stay in the best neighbourhood in Ottawa. Glebe / Old Ottawa South. Only a 5 minute walk from the Rideau Canal. 10 minute walk to Landsdowne Park (home of the Redblacks, 67s, and Fury). Walk to some of the best restaurants, bars, and sites that Ottawa has to offer!

My home is an old century home in this historic neighbourhood that I've newly renovated with modern finishings from top to bottom. Tonnes of space for your family and friends to relax and feel at home.

The space
My home is fully automated. Meaning lights, door, temperature control can all be controlled via phone apps or Alexa (yes you can ask Alexa to turn off the kitchen lights).

Access to my home is granted through phone app or lockbox at the front door. I prefer going through the app, but let me know if this is not convenient for you.

Audio speakers in the main kitchen and living area to play your favorite songs.

Full washer and dryer is available

name: Bright and charming apt. in Little Italy/Chinatown
description:
Please note that for the safety of our guests, we are taking extra precautions due to COVID-19. This includes additional sanitation and we ask that you refrain from booking if you have experienced any of the following symptoms:
- cough
- fever
- tiredness
- difficulty breathing

Perfect location for your Ottawa winter getaway! Located less than 2km from Rideau canal's Dows lake and close to the city centre.

The space
Simply furnished with the essentials.

A window AC unit is installed in the bedroom for the summer months.

Other things to note
PARKING:
Street parking is free/unlimited on weekends on adjacent streets. Everywhere in Ottawa has a 6hour limit during the day (unless otherwise indicated). Parking on our street is 1h and unlimited overnight as of 6pm to 8am; the perpendicular street (Anderson) is 3hour limit until 4:30pm and a section of Poplar does not indicate a limit.

name: Cozy apartment in Ottawa South
description:
This is a cozy and bright bachelor apartment in our basement; entrance is shared. The living area includes a sofa bed that accommodates a couple and there is a single bed in a separate area. The kitchenette is equipped with microwave oven, cook top and a mini fridge along with basic utensils. If you need parking we can provide space in our driveway. The area is full of green spaces and bike paths and the house is a 20 min walk to the Greenboro bus/train station. We can only host two guests.

Guest access
Guests have access to our laundry provided they are staying for longer than 5 days. There is free parking space in our driveway.

Other things to note
The reservation is exclusive for the person whose profile was used to book through AirBnb, we do not accept third parties who do not have a profile on AirBnb. Also, if you have an extra guest, the reservation is exclusive for that guest - we do not accept exchanges of guests during your stay.

name: Family Friendly Guest Suite in Ottawa Neighborhood
description:
Located in a mature, quiet and safe neighbourhood where neighbours are all very friendly. You often see people walking their dogs, riding bicycles, cutting their grass or tending to their gardens.
I live on the main floor so you may run into me in the garden, cooking dinner on the bbq or just sitting at the patio table having a glass of wine!

The space
My rental facility was built to meet all Province of Ontario building codes. You will be staying in a safe place.
You'll have your own kitchen to cook meals, if you choose to do so. There's a gas bbq outside on the backyard deck that you are welcome to use. Otherwise I can recommend many order-in options.
With a semi-private separate entrance to the suite, you can come and go as you please without worry.
Shopping, theatres and downtown Ottawa are a short bus ride (20 minutes) or car drive (10 minutes) away.

Guest access
You will have full access to a 2-bedroom, 1 bat

name: Private Room - Queen Bed - Centrally Located
description:
Private room (queen size bed) with key entry on door in a guest suite. Shared common areas (living room, bathroom and kitchenette). Centrally located in Ottawa. Close to recreational pathway, parks, museums, restaurants, shopping malls, financial district and night life district. Close to highway, train station and bus stops. 10 mins drive to Parliament Hill and Byward Market, 4 mins drive to train station, 6 mins drive to bus station and 17 mins drive to airport.

The space
The private bedroom has a queen size bed and private closet. The shared space includes 1 full bathroom, a living room with a TV, small dining table with four chairs and a mini fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster and coffee maker. There is no sink in the kitchenette.

Other things to note
Please take off shoes at the entrance and place on the boot tray.
No visitors allowed on the property or in the AirBnb.
Quiet hours are between 11 pm and 7 am.
Each addi

name: Home away from home in the Heart of Ottawa
description:
Everything you need in this tastefully appointed apartment in Ottawa’s popular Glebe neighborhood. Fully equipped kitchen, heated marble bathroom flooring, Queen sized bed, TV, Netflx, wifi. Free parking on site. Perfect for couples and business travellers. Minutes by foot to Dow’s Lake, the Canal and boutique restaurants in the Glebe & Little Italy. Walk to the best Ottawa has to offer in Entertainment, Museums, Galleries and Universities. Moments from public transit.

The space
The apartment has a shared entrance with the main house. Once in the house, the apartment has a lockable door for security on the unit itself. The living room sofa is a pull out bed for a third guest. Pillows and bedding are stored inside the sofa bed.

Other things to note
Your health is our priority. Please note that all our linens are sanitized between guest stays and all hard surfaces such as fixtures, light switches and counter tops are disinfected after each

name: Amazing Location Entire Condo /w Home Theater!
description:
Steps away from the ByWard market and Parliament, this unit has a luxurious feel with high end furniture and appliances.

Home automation with G00GLE and Alexa, heated toilet seats, 4K HDR TV with surround, and a home theatre in the bedroom makes this unit stand out from the rest.

If you're single or a couple visiting on business or a tour, this unit is perfect for you to unwind and feel like you're at home.

The unit also includes heated indoor parking with a remote for easy access.

Enjoy.

The space
The unit includes all the basic amenities plus many you will not find in most other units, including:

- Modern design - quality furniture and appliances make you feel nice and comfortable.

- Full bathroom with Japanese style heated toilet seat and bidet with spa features.

- Home automation with G00GLE and Alexa. Control lights, music, and more with these cool devices. If you would like me

name: 200 year old heritage home, original exposed stone!
description:
This bright and beautiful newly renovated heritage home is over 200 years old! Step back in time with original exposed stone walls and framing built from trees which were alive in the 1700s. Modern elements combined with rustic features are sure to make your stay memorable and unique! Luxurious linens, Endy mattresses and plenty of pillows guarantee the best night ever.

Note the exterior is monitored by a security camera. Parking would not fit a truck due to length, as the alley is too narrow.

Complimentary tea and coffee (using our Keurig with optional milk frother!) ensure you get your mornings started right. Walk to the National Art Gallery only a half a block away, or the Byward Market is sure to please with its countless restaurants, buskers and shops, only a 2 minute walk from your front door! In the summer, sit out on your private back deck and BBQ up some burgers for you and your friends, and enjoy the city life in a tiny oasis just for you.

Eve

name: Executive home with hot tub
description:
This lovely home in Gloucester has plenty of room for the whole family to visit Ottawa & stay together, or a group of colleagues in town. Relax in the hot tub after a busy day touring, or snuggle up with some Netflix. The executive kitchen will ensure the whole family can cook and eat in if you're tired of eating out! 2.5 bathrooms make it quick & painless getting ready each morning.

Note there is a security camera monitoring the entrance & parties/extra guests will not be tolerated.

The space
AMENITIES NEARBY:

Food-  Hunter's Public House  (4750 Bank)

name: Private room in a 4 bedroom home in Barrhaven (R)
description:
Sorry, no third party bookings, not accepting International Guests for the time being.
Located in suburban Ottawa (Barrhaven), private house with 4 bedrooms on the 2nd floor, 3 of which are available to be booked. Shared bathroom with tub and shower for the 3 rooms. Walking distance to bus, or a few minutes drive to the park & ride. Access to shared kitchen, and TV in the basement. About an hour by bus to downtown Ottawa, or a 20 minute drive.
We have 2 friendly cats who like attention.

Elegant and bright bedroom with closet in quiet,safe and friendly community.
Brand new furniture and sheets
Public library and Gym and community recreation center

2 minutes drive to Sobeys supermarket, 24-hour MacDonald.

5 minutes drive to high tech IT zone, 24-hour Goodlife fitness gym.

10 minutes drive to Costco, Tanger outlets, hockey centre, auto park.

The space
Private bedroom, independent washroom, shared Kitchen, laundry,living room

This is the most beautiful community in Ottawa.

There is a deep forest park and a football field nearby.

Private bedroom, independent washroom, shared Kitchen, laundry,living room

name: 216: 61 Parent Byward Market Rooms
description:
This is 1 of 20 spacious & spotless rooms available for short or long term stays. Walking distance to Ottawa U, Rideau Center, Parliament Hill, National Arts Center, National Gallery, shops, grocery stores, restaurants & more. Shared bathrooms & showers on each floor. Male & Female washrooms are separate. Large common kitchen, dining hall, TV & sitting room. Kitchen is stocked with plates, utensils, glasses & cookware. Beside Élisabeth Bruyère Hospital & bus stops. Fantastic central location!

The space
This unit has a private bedroom with a locking door, a desk, sink, clothing storage and a single bed. The rooms are in a large three level building, conveniently located in the heart of the Byward Market. The first level consists of a large communal kitchen, coin laundry and a large sitting room with a TV. There are 20 single rooms located on the second and third floor. Each floor has separate rooms for showers and separate rooms for washrooms so no one has to wai

name: Brand New Stunning Downtown Loft
description:
Brand new build, newly furnished, located in the heart of Sandyhill. Ideal for families and working professionals. Less than a 10 min walk to Byward Market, Ottawa University, Grocery stores, Rideau Center, LCBO, Beer store, Nightlife, Restaurants, banks, pharmacies, Yoga studios, Coffee shops & more. Walk to museums, National Arts Center, National Gallery & Parliament hill. Easy self check in. Great location & space! On sight parking provided. Long Term rentals welcome.

The space
This is a third floor apartment located in a brand new building. The unit includes top of the line finishings, hard wood floors, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances.

Guest access
The entire apartment is yours - this is not a shared space.

name: Happy Traveller in Ottawa
description:
Nice and clean bedroom. Safe neighbourhood! Great location! 5-30 minutes WALKING distance to Important touristic sites. No need a bus to move around downtown. We are close to Restaurants, coffee shops, bike paths, museums, Financial sector, Parliament Hills, Ottawa University, Carleton University and other important sites.

The space
Spacious bedroom, lots of natural light. 3er level. Share bathroom.

name: Art and music hub in the ❤️of Ottawa! - Bedroom 2
description:
Beautiful brick home and creative hub in the heart of Ottawa. A short walk from the Byward market, the National Gallery and the Parliament buildings and next to incredible restaurants and shops.
Calling all tribe! Our home is an intentional space for art, music and local culture and we hold living room concerts, art exhibitions and events regularly. We are very welcoming and creative people and we love to create meaningful world-class experiences for our guests.

The space
While you're with us you are welcome to enjoy our home as if it were your own. Your bedroom is one of three unique rooms on the second floor of the house. It has a queen innerspring mattress with 100% organic cotton sheets, feather pillows and duvet. In your room you will also find a hand painted wall mural, a chair, plants and a full length mirror.

We have a variety of art filled common spaces, work areas, a sunny kitchen and a shared bathroom as well as a large front porch

name: Art and music hub in the ❤️of Ottawa! - Bedroom 3
description:
Beautiful brick home and creative hub in the heart of downtown Ottawa. A short walk from the Byward market, the National Gallery and the Parliament buildings and next to incredible restaurants and shops.
Calling all tribe! Our home is an intentional space for art, music and local culture and we hold living room concerts, art exhibitions and events regularly. We are very welcoming and creative people and we love to create meaningful world-class experiences for our guests.

The space
While you're with us you are welcome to enjoy our home as if it were your own. Your bedroom is one of three unique rooms on the second floor of the house and is sometimes used as an art studio. It has a medium firm double futon mattress with 100% cotton sheets and feather pillows & duvet. In your room you will also find local art, plants and reading chair. Anything else you need please let us know.

Our house has a variety of art filled common spaces, work areas, a s

name: Large Space in Centretown in Beautiful Home
description:
We are conveniently located in Centretown/downtown, 5 mins walk to bank street, 10 mins walk to downtown government offices and 20 mins walk to Parliament.

What to expect: you are sharing the house with a couple, tidy and clean. The entire basement unit is yours. It is quite spacious but you are welcome to spend as much time in common areas as you wish. The bathroom, living room and kitchen is shared.
Paid parking is nearby. Street parking is free from 4pm until about 10am.

The space
This unit is quite spacious and has both east and west facing windows. Beautiful, exposed brick wall. There is a TV with a DVD player for movies and is available Netflix upstairs. Ample closet space with a dresser. Basement has a queen sized bed with a futon.

Other things to note
Note: This townhouse is not air conditioned. The basement is quite cool during the summer. Additionally, the basement has a small portion of roof that is 5'9"

name: Henia's INN, Room #1
description:
COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION TO SUIT YOUR NEEDS
Whether you are in town for a few nights or a few weeks, Henia's Inn knows how to accommodate your needs. Our guest are treated with HOME MADE BREAKFAST which are served every morning.
Located close to Senators Stadium (Canadian Tire C.), Tanger outlet and many other facilities. Spacious ~1.9 sqf. Public Transit.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families with kids.
Free street parking, free unlimited WiFi.

The space
Brand new on Airbnb!!!

name: Private Master Bedroom & Bath in Female Residence
description:
Fully Furnished private bedroom with private bathroom in beautifully renovated female only student residence, steps to Ottawa U. Spacious master bedroom with lots of natural sunlight is equipped with a pillow top double bed, desk, office chair, book case, double closet, & bar fridge. Renovated kitchen with all utensils. Includes central A/C, WiFi, & laundry on site. This house is very safe & quiet (students studying at all times). All tenants are female & wonderful!

The space
This is a female only student residence with 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms (one is private). Very quiet residence as students studying at all times. No smoking, no drinking and no drugs permitted on the property. Limited common areas to minimize noise during school sessions.

Guest access
In addition to your private bedroom and private bathroom, there is a shared kitchen and 1.5 (shared) bathrooms.

Other things to note
One parking spot maybe

name: Newly Reno'd 2 BD in Hintonburg  Balcony & Parking
description:
Cozy and ideally located just a few steps from Wellington St. and minutes from Little Italy, Dow's Lake, the Parliament.

The space
Modern and fully-equipped, this 2 bedroom apartment is conveniently located, clean, practical and very comfortable for your stays in Ottawa, year-round. After enjoying the Nation's Capital's many attractions, come back to your home to sit back and relax, cook a nice meal in the fully equipped kitchen, or dine out at one of many amazing nearby restaurants.

Step into this charming 19th Century building and up the indoor staircase to discover all the features this apartment has to offer. To your left, an open space kitchen and dining area connects onto the living room and private balcony; to your right, two bedrooms and a bathroom.

The modern and bright kitchen includes a full set of kitchenware and appliances (Coffee Maker/Kettle/Stove/Microwave), and we provide basic kitchen staples including coffee/tea/sugar/and

The guest suite is close to a recreational pathway, parks, museums, restaurants, shopping malls, financial district and night life district. Free parking for one vehicle. Close to highway, train station and bus stops. 10 mins drive to Parliament Hill and Byward Market, 4 mins drive to train station, 6 mins drive to bus station and 17 mins drive to airport.

The bedroom in the guest suite has a queen size bed and a closet. The guest suite includes a full bathroom, a living room with a TV, small dining table with four chairs and a mini fridge, microwave, kettle, toaster and coffee maker. There is no sink in the kitchenette.

Guest access

description:
Elegant 3-storey detached home in heart of Kanata, Ottawa! Spacious sunny space with hardwood, gas stove, many windows, inviting layout & shaded garden with calming waterfall. Freshly painted & baths upgraded. Parking; Netflix; A/C; fast WiFi. Park, play structure & soccer field across the street; walk to shops, restos, multiplex cinema. Short drive to Canadian Tire Centre, Sensplex, tech hub, Tanger outlet mall, 25 mins. to downtown. More than a place to sleep!
Short & long term stays welcome.

The space
My freshly painted house, on three storeys, is stylish and comfortable. It's a welcoming space with A/C, feather-filled sofas, lots of lighting, a 34" TV with Netflix and a three-sided gas fireplace in the family room adjacent to the fully-equipped kitchen.

The basement TV room has a 52" TV with Chromecast for streaming content from your laptop. That space also has a full bathroom, yoga mat and weights.

The professionally-landscaped,

name: Carsonby Garden Farms
description:
Delightful country retreat located on 140 acres, with groomed trails for cross-country skiing, snow shoeing or just a stroll in nature. There is also a rustic cabin located on the property with a large bonfire pit complete with seating and plenty of sticks for roasting marshmallows. For a fee, we are happy to prepare A hot chilli to warm you and your guests. Previous events held on the property have included weddings, rehearsal dinners and wedding photo shoots.

The space
A 2 night minimum stay is required. No pets, parties or smoking allowed.

name: Classy and modern townhouse, king bed & near park!
description:
This beautiful, fresh and comfortable townhouse is all yours to enjoy! New and modern, stretch out in the king bed in the master bedroom, or cozy up on the large couch for some Netflix or Amazon Prime (no cable). The basement TV has a DVD/Bluray player, but bring your own movies! Enjoy complimentary Keurig coffee or tea in the mornings, and BBQ some dinner for the family in the evenings. Note there is an exterior security cameras monitoring the entrance. Absolutely no parties will be tolerated.

The space
Five can sleep comfortably in 1 king bed, 1 double and 1 twin. Plenty of room in the backyard for the kids to play, and BBQ or cook up a storm in the fully equipped kitchen.

Netflix or Amazon Prime is yours to enjoy on the flat screen TV, and there is a second TV in the basement and third TV in the master bedroom, all with Netflix.

My same-sex partner and I live in a three bedroom, two bathroom townhouse.

We would like to rent a fully-furnished bedroom and adjoining washroom, ideally to a male or female university Co-op student or recent graduate who is working in Kanata's high-tech industry.

The space
The bedroom is in the basement and has lots of natural daylight. It has laminate floors, a closet, a dresser and a desk and chair. The bed is double sized and is comfortable. The bedroom also has a programmable thermostat and dehumidifier. Next to the bedroom is the guest's washroom, which has a soaker-bathtub and shower.

Guest access
The guest will have shared access to our kitchen, living room, and laundry room.

Our miniature Australian Shepherd dog (Chloe) is extremely friendly and playful. We also have two budgie birds in the kitchen.

description:
Cozy apartment in the heart of Hintonburg! This large 1-Bedroom plus office is steps from parks, nightlife and countless shops. Walk to the Parkdale Market, Chinatown, Little Italy or the Ottawa river.

Dine in or eat out steps from home (pending City of Ottawa COVID guidelines). There are dozens of quality restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, boutiques, farmers market, Westboro beach with a bar playing live Latin music, Experimental farm with botanical gardens, walks, boat rentals.

The space
This apartment is on the first floor of a beautiful historic duplex located at the heart of the Hintonburg. Parking in the rear of the building. Updated with a lot of love, this hideaway features modern floors with rustic touches, full kitchen and 3 private patios. The duplex sleeps 2 adults comfortably, with 1 king size bed. If you are inviting others, there is ample room for a blowup mattress in the office (bring your own).

Close to public transportation (train & buses) to downtown and other hot spots, and bike route. 5min to Carleton University. 20min to Downtown/ University of Ottawa & 10min to the Airport. all access

Walker's paradise, walk score 93; transit score: 89; bike score: 75.

description:
Full Home for those needing the space!

3 Full Bedrooms. Sleeps 6! Cozy, Clean, and Spacious! The perfect home away from home! Short Drive from Downtown Ottawa, Byward Market, Rideau Shopping Center, Rideau Canal, and Parliament Hill! GREAT place to discover Ottawa!

Safe and happy travels!

description:
The Room is perfect for 2 persons.

name: Spacious 2Bed 2Bath Downtown Condo with Parking!
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom + 2 full bathroom condo by the Rideau Canal, CF Rideau Centre, Parliament Hill, and everything else Downtown Ottawa has to offer. It's crazy convenient, tucked away in an unassuming and quiet building steps off Elgin Street. Warm, charming, relaxing, with ample space for you to spread out.

The space
The condo has a thoughtfully renovated open-concept layout and is a very large unit for downtown Ottawa.

Featuring an open kitchen with a breakfast bar, modern glass dining table that seats 4, a wall-mounted 60" TV, in-unit laundry and a huge sectional to spread out on.

The master bedroom has a queen bed and full en-suite bathroom. The second bedroom has a double bed and is situated right across from the other full bathroom. Both bedrooms have their own desk/workspace.

We've added little touches such as remote controlled lights in the master bedroom as well as in the corner reading nook on the couch.

Our home is located within a block of Bank Street close to everything you may need - coffee shops, world famous Gelato, pubs, and even an Indie movie theatre. Two bedrooms are available for guests please see (other) listing for second bedroom. Please note we have two friendly dogs on the premises.

description:
An artful oasis in the heart of Ottawa’s Centretown neighbourhood.

ALLERGY ALERT: a cat has lives on the premises.

The space
A vintage-modern two-bedroom apartment with lots of natural light.

Relax in its open concept lounge, dine in the breakfast nook, pour yourself a glass of wine, put on a record, and dive into a coffee table book.

You are steps away from Centretown's adorable Dundonald Park, Chinatown, and a 12 minute walk to the Glebe, Golden Triangle. A 15-minute walk from Downtown, and the Hintonburg neighbourhoods.

Whether you want a quiet space to read, or want to socialize with locals, my apartment is surrounded by helpful friends/neighbours, always happy to meet travellers, and offer pro-tips for enjoying the city and our neighbourhood.

description:

Pet, child and baby friendly, we offer a space to relax and enjoy yourself with a TV set up with netflicks, comfortable beds, open concept kitchen and one parking spot. One extra parking spot may be available if needed - check with host on cost and availability.

description:

Includes washer & dryer
Guests have access to unlimited high-speed internet and Netflix.

Located in the heart of Centertown (Some minor street noise can be heard from the apartment.)

description:
Main floor suite in a residential house.
Ten minute drive to the parliament/fifteen minute bus ride.
The suite has a queen bed, a balcony, a full kitchen, very bright, and a bathroom. Its fully private. Nothing is shared. Very clean!
Good location.

A private floor in a private house. Its a quiet house.
The place is NOT for people who want an apartment to party and have loud conversations. Please book somewhere else.
This is an apartment for guests who want privacy, and a quiet, clean stay.

The space
Not meant for partying, but enjoying the accommodation.
Very bright and extra clean. There is no television, however there is full wifi access.

It's eco friendly and recycling is encouraged.
For health reasons, there is no microwave. I am sorry.

If you are looking for peace and quiet, this place may be for you.
If you are loud and that's your nature, this place may not be for you.

This elegant semi-detached home is located on a quiet cut de sac, steps from the Byward Market and across the street from a play park. The residence features neutral tones throughout, touches of blue, tasteful furnishings and decor, and access to an outdoor patio and BBQ.

The space
The main floor features a kitchen, dining and living room, with access to the outdoor patio and BBQ (for use from May to October).

The second floor has 2 bedrooms, a 4 piece bathroom and washer and dryer. Please note the stairs to the second floor are angled and you must be careful with children.

The third floor is an open concept loft style bedroom with ensuite, 3 piece bathroom. Please note the stairs to the third floor are without a railing.

The house is equipped with wifi, TV (access to Netflix, but no cable) and air conditioning.

A shared modern eat in kitchen with seating area and TV. This home is sparkling clean with extra sanitizing.

The space
Large modern eat in shared kitchen with stove, dishwasher, microwave, fridge and double sink. Shared areas are sanitized regularly.

Excellent place for professionals in transition looking for flexible length of stay.

This fully renovated home features modern furnishings, free parking and in unit laundry.

name: A nice, quiet and clean room in OTTAWA ON
description: Nice, clean and close to the parliament hill (15 minutes).

name: Cozy Bedroom Theatre
description:
Fully furnished bedroom in a single family home.

The room is complete with a therapeutic mattress, a small carpet, a dresser, closet, a window with a view of the sunrise (for all you early birds).

For all you night owls, the room also features curtains, led lights, a projector with application like Crave, Netflix, Disney Plus and more. The room also features artwork that change with the colour of that led lights.

The space
As a Guest you expected to respect Ontario provincial COVID-19 by-laws. Also well as be mindful of the space. Guest are expecting to Take off shoes at the front foyer and wash their hands when they come into the home.

Masks must be worn on the way to the 1 bedroom. Once inside, you are free to remove your mask. Smoking is NOT permitted inside the home. However, guest are invited to smoke outside at a reasonable distance, or in the backyard.

name: Cozy One Bedroom Apartment Near The Falls.
description:
Grocery Market walking distance also a few restaurants and fast food places. Pharmacy nearby. 15 minutes walking distance to Carleton University. Many routes to downtown.

Other things to note
Bathroom and Kitchen Given Clean and must be returned clean
Due to Covid-19 All towels and etc must be placed in a bag for instant wash after you leave the place!

name: Chilling in Ottawa
description:
Peaceful two bedroom home with many amenities including ping pong, basketball and a makers space. Enjoy your morning coffee on the front porch or hang out in the hammock watching the garden grow. Two blocks from conservation area teeming with local wildlife. Park, bus stops and access to city-wide bike paths. 5 minutes to free tennis courts, pickle ball court and shopping area.

The space
Our place is a 2 floor 2 bedroom tranquil home. Lay on the hammock, shoot some hoops or try your hand at ping pong. There’s much to explore in this gateway to tranquility.

name: Jack Pine House
description: A cozy third floor bedroom. Fully furnished and equipped.

description:
Luxurious home with 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths PLUS an office and a professional ping-pong table. Tastefully decorated with high-end finishes. All amenities provided including ultra high speed internet, on-site laundry, a propane BBQ and many more. Close to shopping, bike trails and the award winning Vimy Memorial Bridge. The home is located in a quiet neighborhood and is ideal for families.

Guest access
Guests have access to all areas of the home.

Other things to note
Nespresso Machine:

The home comes with a Nespresso machine. It uses regular original Nespresso pods. Please bring your own pods for coffee.

Ping Pong:

The homes comes with a professional grade ping pong table. Please bring your own pads and balls if you would like to play.

name: Somerset Nest
description:
A newly renovated apartment located in the heart of Chinatown and just minutes away from downtown. Close to little Italy with tons great restaurants to chose from. Uber drivers are readily available and a bus stop that takes you directly to the LRT station is close by. Ottawa is now home to two new companies that rent out electric scooters that go 20km/h and are parked and ready to rent all across downtown (always a few available out front) (Bird or Lime)

description:
Light a cozy gas fire, snuggle on a couch to watch movies, and soak in a bathtub before bedtime. There's plenty of room for everyone to spread out in this luxurious family house. With tasteful artwork and a minimalistic design adorning every space, it makes every moment of the stay feel both chic and comfortable.

The space
This lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is located in a quiet neighbourhood of Kanata.

Our home features modern touches throughout. The main floor offers hardwood flooring, a spacious living room inclusive of a TV with Netflix access (no cable), fully equipped kitchen, and dining room. Outside the main floor living room, you will walk onto a small balcony that offers some seating and a barbecue that's equipped with propane.

The second floor has hardwood throughout, offers a second family room offering a TV with Netflix access (no cable), and a cozy gas fireplace.

description:
Newly renovated spacious home in the center of Ottawa, 5 or 10 minutes drive to downtown (parliament hill), Mooney's bay (beach), Botanic (Ornamental) Gardens, Ottawa civic hospital, Carleton University and Algonquin College. This space is good for groups of 6+ or family who like to enjoy downtown Ottawa, yet close to the beach and beautiful walking trails or the farm. Situated on a quite street, easy to access the highway, there are 6+ cars parking, big flowers gardens and vegetable garden.

The space
New furniture, new huge TV, and new bedding. You can enjoy gorgeous huge flowers gardens in the front, or pick up some fresh organic vegetables on the back garden. There are 4 queens beds and one single bed available to use.

description:
Hip central location, trendy spacious home and untouched amenities! Ottawa's ideal home away from home for the traveling professional, family or explorer! Fully furnished unit equipped with all the conveniences you expect in a home, plus unmatched amenities to provide you with an endless array of possibilities. Our central location allows for easy commutes to local communities, trendy restaurants and shops, as well as Ottawa’s business core.

description:
This newly renovated room in Kanata's Bridlewood area is perfect for a professional or a couple. It comes with a queen-size bed complete with a new mattress, a cozy office space, closet and night lamp. Large south-facing windows allow plenty of natural light.

Lots of privacy, including a full private bathroom. Walking distance to gyms, groceries, restaurants, and amazing walking trails.

It is only 10 min drive to CTC and Tanger Outlets. 20 min drive to Diefenbunker - Canada’s Cold War Museum.

The space
Our guests are welcome to use the family kitchen to warm up food and make tea/coffee. Please refrain from cooking/warming up foods with strong odours. Our guests are also welcome to use the breakfast area, dining room, and backyard.

We ask to respect our house and clean after yourself. No smoking and no parties please.

We ask that you take your shoes off inside the house.

The design vibe is distinctly Canadiana - you might think you are in Muskoka or the Laurentians. The outside of this classic 1920's home may be historic, but this apartment is eclectic and stylish. name: Large private separate entrance room in Ottawa
description:
Great location in an upscale neighborhood. Right beside all amenities, bus stops close by. All shopping walking distance and lots of great local resturaunts. Guests will have their own seperate entrance access, their own drive way, and a full backyard with privacy. This room is a sunroom with large windows and shutters . Very cozy and spaciouse. Plenty of room for one or a couple. Room will have a large T.V. that guests can use as well.
5G Unlimited high speed Wifi

The space
The room is a sun room with a separate entrance and access to a full private backyard with lots of trees to watch the birds and squirrels. Very relaxing environment and very peaceful neighborhood.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire house and backyard. They may also use the garage if they wish.

name: KANATA LUXURIOUS TOWNHOUSE FOR WEEKLY,MONTHLY STAY
description:
Cozy and spacious family friendly 3 bedroom townhouse with brand new furniture and appliances.30 min from DT,museums,le Nordic Spa,Gatineau,cross country and downhills skiing.Bus station around the corner.located in quite residential area surrounded by parks,lakes,French immersions schools and children playground.Very close to shopping area Walmart,Superstore,Metro,Food Basic,Lowe’s.

The space
The house is spacious and you have access to entire house ,except basement which locked by the owner.We have 3 beautiful bedrooms which can accommodate 5 people.
We have Gas Stove,if you don’t know how to use it Do Not Use.
The Appliance are new,please use it carefully,remember this is my home that I live 24/7 with my 3 boys.If I am travelling I usually post it on Airbnb.Respect the space and don’t move items around.

Ac and laundry available.

I am available 24 hours via message or email.

Guest access
Entire house

description:
A cozy 3 Room(2Bedroom/1 Office Room) Apartment, comes with high speed internet, Netflix TV, cooking amenities, parking for 2 cars.
Close to Algonquin College, Airport, Merivale business area and the greenbelt. Public transit is just around the block.
Includes complimentary breakfast.

The space
A calm and cozy 3 Room (2Bedroom/1 Office Room) with huge windows in the living room and windows in all the Rooms.
Freshly painted, High speed internet with smart TV and Netflix.
Washer and Dryer is in the basement for your convenience.

Breakfast:
We provide a variety of food items.

Guest access
Guests have their own private entrance with Keyless Entry/Exit and can check in and out at their convenience. You can also use the laundry and dryer in the common space

Other things to note
Laundry is only for guests staying over 3 nights
