name: Large and Cozy Bedroom & Office in Barrhaven House
description:
Cozy room, with comfortable queen-size high bed, good external lighting and side view in a large house; shares a fresh looking bathroom.

The house is in a quiet area in Barrhaven across from a lake, near walking trails along Jock River, near grocery stores (24-hour Sobeys, Loblaws, Independent, Walmart, Metro), shopping centres, banks, Empire Cinema Movie Theatre, and only 3-minute walk to a recreational center (swimming pool, hot-tub, gym, fitness classes, ice rinks).

name: LUXURIOUS 1 BDRM HOME IN ORLEANS OTTAWA
description: Sophistication & elegance are the best words to describe this highly upgraded and impeccably maintained 4 bed luxury home, This home is sure to impress.The grand foyer features high end porcelain tiles which lead you to the rest of this magnificent home featuring hardwood floors on both main & 2nd floor, & dramatic 8ft doors.Large principal rooms, a chef's dream kitchen , Italian tile & maple cabinets & terrace doors leading to the spacious yard.

name: Beautiful Place in Ottawa with 2 Beds
description:
Beautiful apartment with 2 comfortable queen beds and a sofa bed in the living room located 9 minutes away from Parliament Hill! You will have access to the entire place with free wifi and Roku channels! This place fits 5 people in total with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed!

The space
There is one bedroom, with 2 queen beds, you will also have access to a very comfortable sofa bed in the living room.

You will also have access to everything in the kitchen as well such as stove, fridge, microwave, boiler, coffee machine, pots and pans, plates, utensils, and much more!

The home will be entirely yours :)

name: Stylish and Private Downtown Home - Free Parking!
description:
A stunning new AirBNB home, right in the heart of New Edinburgh, Ottawa - just minutes from Downtown!

This private two bedroom apartment has been newly renovated, and tastefully styled with a modern decor. Enjoy all the comforts of home: free to use laundry machines, dishwasher, fully equipped open concept kitchen, unlimited WIFI, complimentary coffee and much more!

This is a non-smoking, non-party unit. Long term stays are encouraged. Book with us today and enjoy a great stay :)

The space
A beautifully done, two bedroom apartment in a quiet residential duplex. Right next door to fun shops and cafes, you won't regret choosing this location. Enjoy a large, open concept kitchen, bar seating, dining room, unlimited WIFI, complimentary coffee and much more. We hope to provide all the comforts of home during your time with us.

Guest access
This is a private, nonshared apartment. Guests have full access

name: Modern Centertown one bedroom
description:
Modern one bedroom apartment in the heart of centertown, conveniently located close to downtown and only 5 minutes drive from Byward Market, Elgin street, Parliaments Hill,Rideau center, museum of nature, war museum and steps from Bank street.
Close to LRT


Freshly decorated with a balcony in a well maintained condo building.

Enjoy Netflix, Prime video and Disney +


Parking available in visitors parking upon registration

name: Wonderful Place Near Byward Market with Parking
description:
A beautiful 1 bedroom apartment located 8 minutes away from the market downtown, you can also park for free right in front of the house as well as full access to free wifi and Netflix :)

The space
You will have access to the entire home, with a comfortable queen bed and very cozy living room with access to netlfix! You also have access to a full kitchen!

name: Budget bedroom, downtown Ottawa
description:
You get your own private bedroom in my downtown apartment. The place is small and simple, but clean and cozy for a short stay at low cost. My place is definitely among the cheapest in this very central area and that is because I do not run a business out of this. So please do not expect hotel type of service (I can't assist with parking, etc). Though clean linens/towels and bathroom essentials are provided.

The common areas (dining room, kitchenette and washroom) are shared with me, the host.

The space
The apartment is located on the second floor of an old (but well maintained) building. I'm quite good at keeping the place clean and tidy. Though there might be some flaws sometimes when guests proceed with self check-in/check-out and I'm not home to take care of everything. But there is always clean bedsheets/towels available. And cleaning supplies in the washroom in case it's needed.
